anya-e0804n0:8_15: Evaṁ sabbesampi gatyatthānaṁ dhātūnaṁ yathāpayogaṁ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:9_0: Tassimāni rūpāni bhavanti – iti, eti, udeti.
anya-e0804n0:9_3: dukāro āgamo. Upeti, samupeti, veti, apeti, aveti, anveti, sameti,
anya-e0804n0:9_5: abhisamayo, īdi, udi, ekodi, paṇḍito, ito, udito, upeto, samupeto, anvito, apeto, sameto, etabbo,
anya-e0804n0:9_15: paṭimukhaṁ itvā, itvāna, upetvā, upetvāna, upetuna,
anya-e0804n0:11_0: Idamettha na vattabbaṁ, dassanāyeva me ruto.
anya-e0804n0:17_6: eso hi sarīrasaṅkhātaguhāsayo maccurājā eva kodhavasena pamaddanto sattasantāne gacchatīti vattabbo.
anya-e0804n0:17_7: Taṁ evarūpaṁ ‘‘maccurājā’’ti vattabbaṁ bahuno janassa anatthakaraṁ kodhaṁ hitakāmo damena paññāya vīriyena diṭṭhiyā ca chindeyyāti.
anya-e0804n0:18_1: ‘‘Etī’’ti ettha hi āupasaggo sandhikiccena paṭicchannattā na pākaṭo valāhakāvattharito puṇṇacando viya.
anya-e0804n0:18_2: Tathā hi ettha ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:18_3: ākārassa ca ikārena parena saddhiṁyeva ekārādeso.
anya-e0804n0:18_7: Byākaraṇasatthepi hi ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho dissati,
anya-e0804n0:18_8: tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n0:18_9: Atha vā itīti rassavasena vuttaṁ padaṁ gamanaṁ bodheti,
anya-e0804n0:18_10: etīti vuddhivasena vuttaṁ pana yathāpayogaṁ āgamanādīni.
anya-e0804n0:18_19: tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n0:19_0: I gatiyanti kathitā, dhātu vuddhiṁ gatā yadā;
anya-e0804n0:24_0: Āgamane ca hotīti, dhīmā lakkheyya taṁ yathā.
anya-e0804n0:29_0: Tathā hi ītīti anatthāya eti āgacchatīti īti, upaddavo,
anya-e0804n0:30_0: Idāni yathārahaṁ nipātākhyātanāmikapariyāpannānaṁ itiito saddānamatthuddhāro vuccate –
anya-e0804n0:30_1: tattha itisaddo hetuparisamāpanādipadattha vipariyāya pakārāvadhāraṇa nidassanādianekatthappabhedo.
anya-e0804n0:30_2: Tathā hesa ‘‘ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccatī’’tiādīsu hetuatthe dissati.
anya-e0804n0:30_8: ‘‘Iti vā iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato’’tiādīsu ādiattho.
anya-e0804n0:30_9: ‘‘Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṁ nāmakammaṁ nāmadheyyaṁ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo’’tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye.
anya-e0804n0:30_16: ‘‘Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā ādanda atthītissa vacanīyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:30_17: Kiṁ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya,
anya-e0804n0:30_20: natthīti kho kaccāna ayaṁ dutiyo anto’’tiādīsu nidassane.
anya-e0804n0:30_22: ‘‘Itāyaṁ kodharūpenā’’ti ettha pana ākhyātavasena gamane itisaddo dissati.
anya-e0804n0:30_25: viññūnaṁ atthaggahaṇe kosallupādanatthaṁ kevalaṁ atthuddhāravasena āgatoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:35_0: Gatyattho icchito ettha, itarattho na icchito;
anya-e0804n0:37_0: Idha pana samayasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ sanibbacanaṁ vattabbampi avatvā upari ayadhātuvisayeyeva vakkhāma
anya-e0804n0:37_3: udetī’’tiādīnañca ekārānantaratyantapadānaṁ aññesañca evarūpānaṁ padamālā yathārahaṁ yebhuyyena attanopadāni vajjetvā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:37_5: Yasmā pana imasmiṁ pakaraṇe sukarā ca dukkarā ca tyantapadamālā jānitabbā ,
anya-e0804n0:37_6: tasmā bhūvādigaṇādīsu aṭṭhasu gaṇesu vihitehi channavutiyā vacanehi sabbasādhāraṇaṁ asabbasādhāraṇañca padamālānayaṁ brūma –
anya-e0804n0:40_0: Iti etī’’ti cetesaṁ, padānaṁ pana pantiyo;
anya-e0804n0:53_0: Ito mutto nayo nāma, natthi koci kriyāpade.
anya-e0804n0:56_0: Idāni ikārānantaratyantapadassa kamo vuccate – iti, inti. Isi, itha. Imi, ima.
anya-e0804n0:56_1: Aparipuṇṇo vattamānānayo. Itu, intu. Ihi, itha. Imi, ima.
anya-e0804n0:56_3: Ettha ca imesaṁ dvinnaṁ sāsanānurūpabhāvassa imāni sādhakapadāni ‘‘veti, apeti,
anya-e0804n0:56_12: Garū pana anu eti anvetīti vadanti. Taṁ –
anya-e0804n0:59_0: Evaṁ taṁ anugacchāmi, putte ādāya pacchato’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:60_0: Imāya pāḷiyā na sameti ‘‘jessantaṁ anvetī’’ti vacanato ‘‘anugacchāmī’’ti vacanato ca.
anya-e0804n0:60_1: Tathā hi etisaddo yattha ce iriyāpathavācako,
anya-e0804n0:60_4: tasmā āgamanatthassa ayuttito gamanatthassa ca yuttito vi itiādinā chedo ñeyyo.
anya-e0804n0:60_5: Etesañca itisaddavasena katachedānaṁ atthibhāvaṁ yuttibhāvañca ‘‘itāyaṁ kodharūpenā’’ti pāḷiyeva sādheti,
anya-e0804n0:60_7: anu isī’’tiādinā ‘‘anvetī’’tiādīnaṁ chede labbhamānanayena vuttappakāro vattamānāpañcamīnayo parassapadavasena dassito.
anya-e0804n0:61_1: sittā te lahumessati. Issati, issanti. Issasi, issatha. Issāmi, issāma. Issate, issante. Issase, issavhe. Issaṁ, issāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:61_2: Asabbadhātukattepi suddhassarattā dhātussa ikārāgamo na labbhati.
anya-e0804n0:62_0: Atha kālātipattiyā rūpāni bhavanti, issā, issaṁsu. Isse, issatha. Issaṁ, issamhā. Issatha, issisu. Issase, issavhe. Issaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:62_2: Kālātipattibhāve ca asabbadhātukatte ca santepi suddhassarattā dhātussa akārikārāgamo na labbhati anekantikattā vā anupapannattā ca akārāgamo na hoti.
anya-e0804n0:63_0: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane sotūnaṁ payogatthesu paramakosallajananatthaṁ ‘‘nanu te sutaṁ brāhmaṇa bhaññamāne,
anya-e0804n0:63_1: devā na issanti purisaparakkamassā’’ti pāḷito nayaṁ gahetvā vuttappakārehi bhavissantiyā rūpehi sabbaso
anya-e0804n0:63_2: samānāni asamānatthāni vattamānikarūpāni ca īsakaṁ aññamaññaṁ samānāni bhavissantīkālātipattīnaṁ rūpāni
anya-e0804n0:65_0: Eti, enti. Esi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n0:66_0: Etu, entu. Ehi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n0:67_0: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṁ, vissāsaṁ eyya paṇḍito;
anya-e0804n0:69_0: Yadā te pahiṇissāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya.
anya-e0804n0:70_0: Eyya , eyyuṁ. Eyyāsi, eyyātha. Eyyāmi, eyyāma. Etha, eraṁ. Etho, eyyāvho. Eyyaṁ, eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:73_0: Essati, essanti. Essasi, essatha. Essāmi, essāma. Essate, essante. Essase, essavhe. Essaṁ, essāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:75_0: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:76_0: ‘‘Abhidosagato idāni ehī’’ti vacanadassanato aparānipi bhavissantīrūpāni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:77_0: Ehiti, ehinti. Ehisi, ehitha. Ehimi, ehima. Ehite, ehinte. Ehise, ehivhe. Ehissaṁ, ehissāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:78_0: Essā, essaṁsu. Esse, essatha. Essaṁ essāmhā. Essatha, essisu. Essase, essavhe. Essiṁ, essāmhase.
anya-e0804n0:80_0: Udeti, udenti; Udesi, udetha; Udemi, udema.
anya-e0804n0:81_0: Udetu, udentu. Udehi, udetha. Udemi, udema, udāmase.
anya-e0804n0:82_0: Udeyya, udeyyuṁ. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Udissati, udissanti. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Udissā, udissaṁsu. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:85_0: Kusadde ke ca. Koti, kavati, kāyati,
anya-e0804n0:86_0: Tatra kānananti ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye kavati saddaṁ karotīti kānanaṁ, vanaṁ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:88_0: Saṇateva brahāraññaṁ, sā rati paṭibhāti ma’’nti
anya-e0804n0:89_1: Atha vā kokilamayūrādayo kavanti saddāyanti kūjanti etthāti kānanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:89_2: Manoharatāya avassaṁ kuyyati paṇḍitehīti kabbaṁ. Kāviyaṁ. Kāveyyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:89_3: Aññatra pana kavīnaṁ idanti kabbanti taddhitavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:89_10: Aññatra pana jātaṁ eva jātakanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:89_11: Tathā hi jātakasaddo desanāyampi vattati ‘‘itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhamma’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:90_2: Nīcasaddo hi hīnavācako ‘‘nīce kule paccājāto’’ti ettha viya.
anya-e0804n0:90_8: kriyāpade vijjamāne nāmikapadaṁ natthīti na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:90_10: takanaṁ’’ iccevamādīni bhāvavācakāni nāmikapadāni sabbāsu dhātūsu yathārahaṁ labbhantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:92_3: tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘appābādhaṁ appātaṅka’’nti imasmiṁ pāḷippadese iti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ ‘‘ābādhoti visabhāgavedanā vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:92_4: yā ekadese uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṁ ayapaṭṭena bandhitvā viya gaṇhāti.
anya-e0804n0:98_1: Idha bhassanaṁ nāma sunakhabhassanaṁ adhippetaṁ ‘‘sunakho bhassitvā’’ti ettha viya,
anya-e0804n0:99_0: Dhaka paṭighāte gatiyañca. Paṭighāto paṭihananaṁ. Dhakati.
anya-e0804n0:100_0: Caka tittipaṭighātesu. Titti tappanaṁ, paṭighātaṁ paṭihananaṁva. Cakati.
anya-e0804n0:101_1: Etā kuādikā akapariyantā dhātuyo parassa bhāsāti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:102_1: Ajjhayanaṁ uccāraṇaṁ sikkhanaṁ vā, ayati, adhīyati,
anya-e0804n0:103_1: Ettha ‘‘yo ātumānaṁ sayameva pāvā’’ti pāḷi papubbassa udhātussa payogoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:106_0: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṁ saraṇato bhaya’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:107_1: Ayaṁ pana vakkasaddo sakkaṭabhāsaṁ patvā kakārarakārasaññogakkhariko bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:107_4: Imassa pana vaṅkasaddassa ‘‘vaṅka koṭille’’ti dhātubhāvo vutto,
anya-e0804n0:107_9: Tatta vaṅkatīti kriyāpadaṁ pāḷiyaṁ avijjamānampi gahetabbameva nāthatīti kriyāpadamiva.
anya-e0804n0:107_10: Bhāvavācakassa pana vaṅkasaddassa atthitā natthitā ca pāḷiādīsu punappunaṁ upaparikkhitabbā.
anya-e0804n0:107_13: Ettha pana aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vaṅkaṁ aṭṭhavaṅkaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:111_0: Baḷise giribhede ca, vattate sa pumā tadā.
anya-e0804n0:113_0: Ettha siyā ‘‘nanu ca bho ‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:113_1: vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chādita’nti ettha vaṅkasaddo guṇavācako visesanasado,
anya-e0804n0:113_3: tena vaṅkaṁ kuṭilaṁ baḷisanti attho viññāyatī’’ti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n0:113_4: vaṅkasadde avuttepi baḷisasabhāvassa vaṅkattā kuṭilattho pākaṭoti natthi visesanasaddena payojanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:113_10: dantiṁ anveti hatthinī’’ti ettha nāgasaddassa dantīsaddassa ca aññamaññapariyā yavacanattepi dantinti manoramadantayuttanti attho saṁvaṇṇito,
anya-e0804n0:113_11: tathā ‘‘baḷisaṁ vaṅka’’nti imesampi aññamaññaṁ pariyāyavacanattepi vaṅkanti kuṭilanti attho vattabbo.
anya-e0804n0:113_12: Evañhi sati attho sālarājā viya suphullito hoti,
anya-e0804n0:113_14: na pana ‘‘vaṅkaṁ baḷisa’’nti saddānaṁ guṇaguṇīvasena samānādhikaraṇabhāvo icchitabbo ‘‘buddho bhagavā
anya-e0804n0:113_15: verañjāyaṁ viharatī’’tiādīsu ‘‘buddho bhagavā’’ti imesaṁ viya samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa anicchitabbattā.
anya-e0804n0:113_16: Na hi īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo porāṇehi anumato.
anya-e0804n0:116_0: ‘‘Buddhaṁ buddhaṁ nikhilavisayaṁ suddhiyā yāva suddhi’’nti ca ādīsu pana anumato.
anya-e0804n0:116_1: Ettha hi ‘‘etādiso’’ti ca ‘‘appaṭipuggalo’’ti ca ‘‘tathāgato’’ti ca ‘‘balappatto’’ti ca ‘‘sambuddho’’ti
anya-e0804n0:116_2: ca ‘‘parinibbuto’’ti ca imāni ‘‘satthā’’ti anena padena samānādhikaraṇāni.
anya-e0804n0:116_3: Tathā ‘‘buddhaṁ buddha’’nti dvinnaṁ padānaṁ pacchimaṁ purimena samānādhikaraṇaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:117_1: vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chādita’’nti ettha vaṅkasaddo baḷisassābhidhānantaraṁ,
anya-e0804n0:117_6: Ettha ca ‘‘vaṅkapabbato’’ti vattabbe sukhuccāraṇatthaṁ niruttinayena majjhe animittaṁ takārāgamaṁ katvā ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:117_10: evaṁ tāpaccayavasena vaṅkatā ca sā pabbato cāti ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:117_12: Atha vā vaṅkamassa saṇṭhānamatthīti vaṅkatoti mantuatthe tapaccayo,
anya-e0804n0:117_14: Evaṁ vaṅkato ca so pabbato cāti vaṅkatapabbato.
anya-e0804n0:118_2: Curādigaṇaṁ pana patvā imissā ‘‘loketi, lokayati, oloketi,
anya-e0804n0:118_4: Lokoti tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti.
anya-e0804n0:118_6: sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti āgato saṅkhāro eva loko saṅkhāraloko.
anya-e0804n0:118_11: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā lokoti vuccatī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:118_12: Lokiyati ettha puññapāpaṁ tabbipāko cāti satto loko.
anya-e0804n0:118_13: Lokiyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto okāso loko.
anya-e0804n0:118_17: Atha vā lokoti tayo lokā kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti.
anya-e0804n0:118_19: Bahiddhā pana kavīhi ‘‘loko tu bhuvane jane’’ti ettakameva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:119_5: tathā hi ‘‘siloko yasassi pajje’’ti kavayo vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:120_0: Deka dheka saddussāhesu. Saddo ravo, ussāho vāyāmo. Dekati. Dhekati.
anya-e0804n0:121_0: Reka saki saṅkāyaṁ. Rekati. Saṅkati, tasmiṁ me saṅkate mano. Saṅkā.
anya-e0804n0:124_1: Lolabhāvo loliyaṁ yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Kakati, kāko, kākī.
anya-e0804n0:125_0: Kuka vaka ādāne. Kukati, vakati, koko, vako.
anya-e0804n0:126_0: Vaka dittiyaṁ paṭighāte ca. Ditti sobhā, vakati.
anya-e0804n0:127_0: Kakivaki sakka tika ṭika seka gatyatthā. Kaṅkati, vaṅkati, sakkati,
anya-e0804n0:127_6: Ettha ṭīkāti ṭikiyati jāniyati saṁvaṇṇanāya attho etāyāti ṭīkā.
anya-e0804n0:127_7: Etā idhātuādikā sekapariyantā dhātuyo ‘‘attanobhāsā’’ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:128_1: Abyattasaddo avibhāvitatthasaddo niratthakasaddo ca. Hikkati, hikkate.
anya-e0804n0:128_5: bādhatī’’tiādinā yebhuyyena dvidhā dvidhā rūpāni sāsane dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:131_1: Pakathanaṁ ācikkhanaṁ desanaṁ vā. Khāti, saṅkhāti.
anya-e0804n0:131_14: Keci pana ‘‘svākhāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākkhyāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākhyāto’’ti ca padamicchanti.
anya-e0804n0:131_15: Tattha pacchimāni sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṁ gahetvā vuttāni,
anya-e0804n0:134_5: Atha vā khiyanti kilesā etthāti khayo,
anya-e0804n0:142_3: Akammakā ime dhātavo. Sukhati, dukkhati. Sukhaṁ, dukkhaṁ. Sukhito, dukkhito.
anya-e0804n0:142_12: Imāni nibbacanāni kāritavasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ sukhadukkhasaddatthaṁ vadantehi garūhi
anya-e0804n0:147_1: Saddasatthe pana dhātupāṭhasaṅkhepe ca ime dhātavo curādigaṇeyeva vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:147_3: Mayaṁ tu tesaṁ tabbacanaṁ suddhakattari ca tāni padarūpāni na icchāma pāḷiādīhi viruddhattā,
anya-e0804n0:148_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘sukhati dukkhatī’’ti kriyāpadāni buddhavacane na dissantīti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:148_1: evaṁ santepi aṭṭhakathānayavasena gahetabbattā dissantiyeva nāma.
anya-e0804n0:148_2: Na hi sabbathā sabbesaṁ dhātūnaṁ rūpāni sāsane loke vā labbhanti,
anya-e0804n0:148_6: ‘‘Kappayavho patissatā’’ti hi diṭṭhe ‘‘caravho bhuñjavho’’tiādīnipi nayavasena diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.
anya-e0804n0:149_1: Visuddhimaggādīsu hi ‘‘ekadviyojanamattampi addhānaṁ gatassa vāyo kuppati,
anya-e0804n0:149_2: gattāni dukkhantī’’ti evaṁ bhūvādigaṇikaṁ akammakaṁ suddhakattuvācakaṁ ‘‘dukkhantī’’ti kriyāpadaṁ dissati.
anya-e0804n0:149_3: Tasmiṁ diṭṭhiyeva ‘‘sukhati, sukhanti. Sukhasi, sukhatha. Sukhāmi,
anya-e0804n0:149_6: dukkhathā’’tiādīnica diṭṭhāni nāma honti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa tādisassa anavajjassa nayassa gahetabbattā,
anya-e0804n0:149_14: Atha vā sukhena ito pavattoti sukhito.
anya-e0804n0:150_7: Keci panimaṁ ‘‘mokkha mocane’’ti paṭhitvā curādigaṇe pakkhipanti.
anya-e0804n0:150_16: taṁ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkho’’ti aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti,
anya-e0804n0:150_23: Evaṁ imassa dhātuno suddhakattuvisaye akammakabhāvo vidito,
anya-e0804n0:150_24: hetukattuvisaye ekakammakabhāvo vidito muca paca chidādayo viya.
anya-e0804n0:152_0: Okha rākha lākha dākha dhākha sosanālamatthesu. Okhati. Rākhati. Lākhati. Dākhati. Dhākhati.
anya-e0804n0:154_0: Ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi gatyatthā. Ukhati. Nakhati. Makhati. Rakhati. Lakhati. Raṅkhati. Laṅkhati. Iṅkhati. Riṅkhati.
anya-e0804n0:158_2: Ettha nakkhattanti etto ito cāti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:158_3: Porāṇā pana ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī’’ti kathayiṁsu.
anya-e0804n0:163_2: ‘‘Kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṁ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṁ dvedhāpatho saṁsayo anekaṁsagāho āsappanā
anya-e0804n0:163_3: parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṁ cittassa manovilekho’’ iccete kaṅkhāpariyāyā.
anya-e0804n0:166_0: Kakhi iccāyaṁ. Dhanaṁ kaṅkhati, abhikaṅkhati, nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṁ. Abhikaṅkhitaṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:167_0: Dakhi dhakhi ghoravāsite kaṅkhāyañca. Daṅkhati. Dhaṅkhati.
anya-e0804n0:170_0: Jakkha bhakkhaṇe ca. Hasanānukaḍḍhanatthaṁ cakāro. Jakkhati.
anya-e0804n0:171_2: Atisallekhatevāyaṁ samaṇo. Lekhā, lekhanaṁ, lekhako, likhitaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:173_1: Varaṇaṁ saṁvaraṇaṁ. Rukkhati. Vakkhati. Rukkho, vakkho.
anya-e0804n0:175_0: Ago nago kujo sākhī, sālo ca viṭapī taru;
anya-e0804n0:176_0: Dumo phalī tu phalavā, gaccho tu khuddapādapo’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:177_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu ca sālasaddena sālarukkhoyeva vutto,
anya-e0804n0:177_2: atha kimatthaṁ sālasaddena yo koci rukkho vutto’’ti?
anya-e0804n0:177_4: atha kho sālarukkhepi vanappatijeṭṭharukkhepi yasmiṁ kasmiñci rukkhepi ‘‘sālo’’ti vohārassa dassanato aññepi rukkhā vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:177_6: Yathāha ‘‘seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahantaṁ sālavanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:180_1: Yathāha ‘‘atha kho taṁ bhikkhave māluvabījaṁ aññatarasmiṁ sālamūle nipateyyā’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:185_2: sikkhitaṁ sippaṁ, sikkhako, sikkhito, sekkho, asekkho.
anya-e0804n0:185_6: tathā hi kattuppayogo dissati ‘‘ahaṁ kho pana susikkhito anavayo sake ācariyake kumbhakārakamme’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:186_5: Ettha pana ‘‘bhikkhu yati samaṇo muni pabbajito anagāro tapassī tapodhano’’ iccetāni pariyāyavacanāni.
anya-e0804n0:187_0: Dakkha vuddhiyaṁ sīghatte ca. Dakkhati, dakkhiṇā, dakkho.
anya-e0804n0:187_1: Dakkhanti vaddhanti sattā etāya yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti dakkhiṇā,
anya-e0804n0:187_3: Dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṁ gacchatīti dakkho, cheko,
anya-e0804n0:188_6: nanu ca bho sarabhaṅgajātake ‘‘gandho isīnaṁ ciradikkhitānaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:188_7: kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā’’ti etasmiṁ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi ‘‘ciradikkhitānanti cirapabbajitāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:188_9: Evaṁ sante kasmā idha ‘‘dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye vuttā’’ti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:188_10: tattha pana dikkhitasaddassa pabbajite vattanato ‘‘cirapabbajitāna’’nti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:188_13: Tāpasā hi muṇḍiyatthavācakena dikkhitasaddena vattuṁ yuttā.
anya-e0804n0:188_14: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi cakkavattisuttatthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:188_15: imissā pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇe ‘‘tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṁ kesamassuṁ ohārenti,
anya-e0804n0:188_17: tena vuttaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā’’ti evaṁ attho saṁvaṇṇito.
anya-e0804n0:191_5: samavisamaṁ abhibyattaṁ vadantaṁ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:191_7: madhuṁ cakkhatī’’tiādīsu viya yasmā assādatthopi cakkhusaddo bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:191_8: tasmā ‘‘cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ assādentaṁ viya hotī’’ti assādatthopi gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:191_9: ‘‘Cakkhuṁ kho māgaṇḍiyaṁ rūpārāmaṁ rūparataṁ rūpasammudita’’nti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:191_10: Satipi sotādīnaṁ saddārāmatādibhāve nirūḷhattā nayane eva cakkhusaddo pavattati paṅkajādisaddā viya padumādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:197_0: Gu karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo vaccakaraṇaṁ. Gavati. Ge sadde. Gāyati. Gītaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:198_3: Tathā hi nāgapetavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘yo so majjhe assatarīrathena catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena.
anya-e0804n0:198_5: amaccharī dānapatī virocatī’’ti imissā pāḷiyā atthaṁ vadantehi ‘‘suvaggitenāti sundaragamanenā’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:198_6: Kiñci bhiyyo kriyāpadampi ca diṭṭhaṁ ‘‘dhunanti vagganti pavattanti cambare’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:199_0: Ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi gamane ca.
anya-e0804n0:199_1: Cakāro gatipekkhako. Raṅgati. Raṅgo. Laṅgati. Laṅgo, laṅgī. Aṅgati, aṅgeti. Aṅgo, samaṅgī,
anya-e0804n0:199_2: samaṅgitā, aṅgaṁ, aṅgaṇaṁ. Vaṅgati. Vaṅgo. Maṅgati. Maṅgo, upaṅgo, maṅgalaṁ. Iṅgati. Iṅgitaṁ. Riṅgati. Riṅganaṁ. Liṅgati. Liṅganaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:199_5: Tattha aṅganti yesaṁ kesañci vatthūnaṁ avayavo,
anya-e0804n0:199_8: Rāgādayo hi aṅganti etehi taṁsamaṅgipuggalā nihīnabhāvaṁ gacchantīti ‘‘aṅgaṇānī’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:199_9: Katthaci malaṁ vā paṅko vā ‘‘tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī’’tiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:199_13: Añjati tattha ṭhitaṁ atisundaratāya abhibyañjetīti hi aṅgaṇaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:204_0: Laga saṅgeca. Ca kāro anantaravuttāpekkhako. Lagati. Ca jato na hoti laganaṁ. Baḷise laggo.
anya-e0804n0:206_0: Agga kuṭilagatiyaṁ. Aggatīti aggi, kuṭilaṁ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:207_0: Aggi dhūmasikho joti, jātavedo sikhī gini;
anya-e0804n0:217_3: Etissā pana divādigaṇaṁ pattāya ‘‘ghāyati ghāyitvā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:219_0: Jaggha hasane. Jagghati, sañjagghati. Sañjagghittho mayā saha. Jagghitumpi na sobhati. Jagghitvā.
anya-e0804n0:224_0: Maghi ketave ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkho. Maṅghati.
anya-e0804n0:226_0: Dāgha āyāse ca. Āyāso kilamanaṁ. Cakāro sāmatthiyāpekkhako. Dāghati. Nidāgho.
anya-e0804n0:233_0: Suca soke. Socati. Soko, socanā, socaṁ, socanto, socantī, socantaṁ kulaṁ, socitvā.
anya-e0804n0:234_0: Kuca sadde tāre. Tārasaddo accuccasaddo. Kocati. Uccasaddaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:235_0: Kuñca koṭilla’ppībhāvesu. Kuñcati. Kuñcikā, kuñcitakeso. Kuñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:236_0: Luñca apanayane. Luñcati. Luñcako, luñcituṁ, luñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:238_0: Vañcu cañcu tañcu gatiyaṁ. Vañcati. Cañcati. Tañcati. Mañcati.
anya-e0804n0:239_0: Gucu gaṇecu theyyakaraṇe. Thenanaṁ theyyaṁ, corikā. Tassa kriyā theyyakaraṇaṁ. Gocati. Gaṇecati.
anya-e0804n0:244_0: Taca saṁvaraṇe. Saṁvaraṇaṁ rakkhaṇaṁ. Tacati. Taco.
anya-e0804n0:248_4: Viyattassa hi vadato puggalassa vasena vācā viyattā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:248_6: na evaṁ vacanasaṅkhāto saddo ‘‘abyattasaddo’’ti vuccati viññātatthattā. ‘‘Vatti, vacati, vacanti.
anya-e0804n0:248_13: Garū pana vakārassa ukārādesavasena ‘‘uttaṁ uccate uccante’’tiādīni icchanti,
anya-e0804n0:248_16: Sāsanasmiñhi rakārāgamavisaye nipubbasseva vacassa vassa ukārādeso siddho ‘‘nirutti, niruttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:248_17: nerutta’’nti. Vacanaṁ, vācā, vaco, vacī, vuttaṁ, pavuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:248_22: imāni nāmikapadāni. Vattuṁ, vattave, vatvā, vatvāna,
anya-e0804n0:249_5: vacantītiādīni kriyāpadarūpāni buddhavacane aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu satthesu ca anāgatattā chaḍḍetabbānī’’ti. Tanna,
anya-e0804n0:249_10: vacantī’’tiādīni rūpāni gahetabbāni. Vaceyya, vuccatu, vucceyya.
anya-e0804n0:250_0: Parokkhārūpāni vadāma – vaca, vacu. Vace, vacittha. Vacaṁ, vacimha. Vacittha, vacire. Vacittho, vacivho. Vaciṁ, vacimhe.
anya-e0804n0:252_0: Ajjatanīrūpāni vadāma – avaci, avocuṁ, avaciṁsu. Avoco,
anya-e0804n0:252_1: avocuttha. Avociṁ, avocumha. Avocā, avocu. Avacase, avocivaṁ. Avocaṁ, avocimhe.
anya-e0804n0:254_8: Aparānipi vacadhātussa bhavissantī sahitāni rūpāni bhavanti –
anya-e0804n0:257_0: Imamhi kappe caritaṁ, pavakkhissaṁ suṇohi me’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:258_0: Gadratapañhepi ‘‘rājā tumhehi saddhiṁ paṭisanthāraṁ katvā gahapati patirūpaṁ āsanaṁ ñatvā nisīdathāti vakkhissatī’’ti evamādiaṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati,
anya-e0804n0:259_4: Idha pana vuttasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vattabbampi avatvā upariyeva kathessāma ito ativiya vattabbaṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0804n0:260_0: Cu cavane. Cavati. Kārite ‘‘cāvetī’’ti rūpaṁ. Devakāyā cuto. Cutaṁ padumaṁ. Cavituṁ, cavitvā.
anya-e0804n0:265_4: Tattha ucchāyo malaharaṇaṁ. Mañcati. Mañco, mañcanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:266_0: Paca byattikaraṇe. Pacati. Pāko, paripāko, vipāko, pakkaṁ phalaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:269_6: Ayañca divādigaṇe ruciatthaṁ gahetvā ‘‘ruccatī’’ti rūpaṁ janeti.
anya-e0804n0:269_8: Curādigaṇe pana ruciatthaṁ gahetvā ‘‘roceti rocayatī’’ti rūpāni janeti.
anya-e0804n0:269_9: Tena ‘‘kiṁ nu jātiṁ na rocesī’’tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:270_0: Paca saṁpāke. Pacati, pacanti. Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘attanobhāsā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:272_7: Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇena nāgaṁ maṇiṁ yāceti, yācayati, yācāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:273_3: Yathā pana sāsane ‘‘paṇḍitoti pavuccatī’’ti vacadhātussa kammani rūpaṁ pasiddhaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:273_5: Evaṁ santepi garū ‘‘tayā paccate odano’’ti tassa kammani rūpaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:273_6: Sāsane pana avisesato ‘‘paccate’’ti vā ‘‘paccatī’’ti vā vuttassapi padassa akammakoyeva divādigaṇiko payogo icchitabbo ‘‘devadatto niraye paccati.
anya-e0804n0:273_8: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīyantiādi viya bhūvādigaṇapakkhiko kammakattuppayogo esa,
anya-e0804n0:273_9: tasmā ‘sayamevā’ti padaṁ ajjhāharitvā ‘sayameva devadatto paccatī’tiādinā attho vattabbo’’ti tanna,
anya-e0804n0:273_10: ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti ettha hi pānīyaṁ manussā pivanti,
anya-e0804n0:273_13: Evaṁ parassa pānakriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtampi taṁ sukarapānakriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhantaṁ
anya-e0804n0:273_14: viya hotīti ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n0:274_0: ‘‘Sayameva kaṭo kariyate’’ti etthāpi kaṭaṁ manussā karonti,
anya-e0804n0:274_3: Evaṁ parassa karaṇakriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtopi so sukaraṇa kriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhanto viya
anya-e0804n0:274_4: hotīti ‘‘sayameva kaṭo kariyate’’ti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n0:275_0: Ettha yathā sayaṁsaddo pānīyaṁ pānīyeneva pīyate,
anya-e0804n0:275_3: na amhehīti sakammakavisayattā payogānaṁ aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanasaṅkhātaṁ atthavisesaṁ vadati,
anya-e0804n0:275_5: kammaṁ paccatī’’tiādīsu tumhehi ajjhāharito sayaṁsaddo atthavisesaṁ vadati akammakavisayattā etesaṁ payogānaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:275_8: Pacadhātu saddasatthe divādigaṇa vutto natthīti ce?
anya-e0804n0:275_12: tasmā mayaṁ lokavohārakusalassa bhagavato pāḷinayaññeva gahetvā imaṁ pacadhātuṁ divādigaṇepi pakkhipissāma.
anya-e0804n0:275_13: Tathā hi dhammapālācariya anuruddhācariyādīhi abhisaṅkhatā divādigaṇikappayogā dissanti –-
anya-e0804n0:277_0: Pacchā paccati pākānaṁ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
anya-e0804n0:279_1: Ettha pana tesaṁ idameva pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0804n0:279_2: Ye curādigaṇamhi sakammakabhāvena bhūvādigaṇe ca akammakabhāvena pavattassa bhūdhātusseva bhūvādigaṇe
anya-e0804n0:279_3: pavattassa sakamakassapi sato divādigaṇaṁ patvā akammakabhūtassa pacadhātussa sakammakattamicchanti.
anya-e0804n0:279_4: Etañhi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā,
anya-e0804n0:279_5: tasmā bhagavato pāvacane sotūnaṁ saṁsayasamugghāṭatthaṁ ettha imaṁ nītiṁ paṭṭhapema –
anya-e0804n0:282_9: Ettha ca sayaṁsaddaṁ ajjhāharitvā ‘‘sayameva odano paccatī’’tiādinā vuttepi ‘‘puriso sayameva pāṇaṁ hanati.
anya-e0804n0:282_10: Bhagavā sayameva ñeyyadhammaṁ abujjhī’’ti payogesu parassa āṇattisambhūtahananakriyāpaṭisedhamiva paropadesasambhūtabujjhanakriyāpaṭisedhanamiva
anya-e0804n0:282_11: ca aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanavasena vuttattā yo sayaṁsaddavasena kammakattubhāvaparikappo,
anya-e0804n0:285_0: Kāmaguṇehi dibbati. Paccāmitte dibbati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:287_0: Payogato sakammā ca, akammā ca gamādayo.
anya-e0804n0:288_0: Puriso maggaṁ gacchati. Gambhīresupi atthesu ñāṇaṁ gacchati. Dhammaṁ carati. Tattha tattha carati.
anya-e0804n0:291_0: Pāsādaṁ passati, pāsādaṁ dakkhati pāsādo dissati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:294_0: Mataṁ vā amma rodanti, idha nandati pecca nandati.
anya-e0804n0:300_0: Tattha yadi sāsane pacadhātussa kammani rūpaṁ siyā,
anya-e0804n0:300_1: ‘‘purisena kammaṁ kariyatī’’ti payogo viya ‘‘purisena odano paciyatī’’ti payogo icchitabbo.
anya-e0804n0:300_2: Ye pana garū ‘‘tayā paccate odano’’tiādīni icchanti,
anya-e0804n0:300_6: Kārite ‘‘puriso purisena purisaṁ vā odanaṁ pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:300_13: gāvaṁ pāceti gocara’’ntiādīsu aññopi attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:301_0: Pacaṁ, pacanto, pacantī, pacamāno, pacamānā. Pātabbaṁ, pacitaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:301_3: Ettha ca ‘‘imassa maṁsañca pātabba’’nti payogo udāharaṇaṁ. ‘‘Pacati, pacanti.
anya-e0804n0:306_0: Paraṁ na byākarissaṁ so, sāsane īrito na hi.
anya-e0804n0:307_0: Chuchedane. Choti. Chotvāna moḷiṁ varagandhavāsitaṁ. Acchocchuṁvata bho rukkhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:308_2: Paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti milakkhūsu aviññātāresu.
anya-e0804n0:310_0: Achi āyāme. Añcati. Dīghaṁ vā añchanto dīghaṁ añchāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0804n0:312_0: Muccha mohamucchāsu. Mucchati. Mucchito visavegena, visaññī samapajjatha. Mucchā, mucchitvā.
anya-e0804n0:315_0: Uchi uñche. Uñcho pariyesanaṁ. Uñchati. Uñchācariyāya īhatha.
anya-e0804n0:317_0: Puccha pañhe pucchati. Pucchitā, pucchako, puṭṭho, pucchito, pucchā.
anya-e0804n0:317_4: Ettha ca pañcavidhā pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṁsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
anya-e0804n0:319_0: Vacchuchedane. Vucchati. Vuttā, vuttavā, vuttasiro. Vakāragatassa akārassa uttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:320_0: Vuttasaddo kesoharaṇepi dissati ‘‘kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro’’tiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:320_1: Ettha ca sirasaddena siroruhā vuttā yathā mañcasaddena mañcaṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n0:322_0: Kesohāre ropite ca, kathite ca yathākkamanti.
anya-e0804n0:323_1: vuttasaddo ‘‘no ca kho paṭivutta’’ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati.
anya-e0804n0:327_1: vuttasaddo saupasaggoca anupasaggo ca vapane vāpasamīkaraṇe kesohāre jīvitavuttiyaṁ pamuttabhāve pāvacanavasena
anya-e0804n0:329_0: Vuttānaṁ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṁ na dubbhatī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:330_4: ‘‘Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāyā’’tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve.
anya-e0804n0:330_5: ‘‘Yesamidaṁ etarahi porāṇaṁ mantapadaṁ gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samīhita’’ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite.
anya-e0804n0:335_0: Pavattite ca ajjhene, kathane cāti lakkhaye;
anya-e0804n0:339_6: Ettha jayāpesunti ‘‘jayatu bhava’’nti āsīsavacanaṁ vadiṁsūti attho. Jayanaṁ, jitaṁ, jayo, vijitaṁ, jino, jetā, jeto,
anya-e0804n0:339_8: māraṁ jito, jitavā, jitāvī, vijitāvī, māraji, lokaji, odhijino,
anya-e0804n0:339_9: anodhijino, jito. Vijito, jetuṁ, vijetuṁ, jitvā, vijitvā.
anya-e0804n0:339_10: Imassa pana dhātussa kiyādigaṇaṁ pattassa ‘‘jināti jinitvā’’tyādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:341_1: Ettha sīghagati adhippetā. Javati. Javanaṁ, javo, javaṁ, javanto,
anya-e0804n0:342_2: Sāsanānurūpena ‘‘kiṁ maṁ dhanena jīyethā’’ti hi pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:346_0: Sakā raṭṭhā pabbājito, aññaṁ janapadaṁ gato;
anya-e0804n0:348_0: Dhajati. Dhajo. Dhañjati. Dhañjanaṁ. Ettha dhajoti ketu. Dhañjananti gamanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:349_3: Imāni panassa pariyāyavacanāni ‘‘ajo eḷako urabbho avi meṇḍo’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:349_8: Tathā hi janakajātake ajarathato meṇḍarathā visuṁ vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:349_9: Apica ajeḷakanti ajato eḷakassa visuṁ vacanato eḷakasaddena meṇḍopi gahetabbo,
anya-e0804n0:350_0: Ajja sajja ajjane. Ajjanaṁ ajjanakriyā. Ajjati. Sajjati.
anya-e0804n0:352_0: Khajja majjane ca. Majjanaṁ suddhi. Byathanāpekkho cakāro. Khajjati. Khajjūro.
anya-e0804n0:354_0: Khaji gativekalle. Kissa bhante ayyo khañjatīti. Ubho khañjā. Khañjanaṁ, khañjituṁ, khañjitvā.
anya-e0804n0:355_1: Ettha ca ejāti lābhādiṁ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā,
anya-e0804n0:356_0: Buja vajiranibbese. Vajiranigghoseti keci vidū vadanti. Bojati.
anya-e0804n0:357_0: Khijakuji guji abyattasadde. Khijati. Kuñjati. Guñjati.
anya-e0804n0:358_0: Laja lāja tajja bhassane. Lajati. Lājati. Tajjati.
anya-e0804n0:360_0: Jaja jaji yuddhe. Yujjhanaṁ yuddhaṁ. Jajati. Jañjati.
anya-e0804n0:362_0: Tuji balane ca. Balanaṁ balanakriyā. Hiṁsāpekkhako cakāro. Tuñjati.
anya-e0804n0:363_0: Gaja kuji muji gajja saddatthā. Gajati. Kuñjati. Muñjati.
anya-e0804n0:364_0: Hatthī nāgo gajo dantī, kuñjaro vāraṇo karī;
anya-e0804n0:366_0: Thambho rammo dvipo ceva, hatthinī tu kareṇukā;
anya-e0804n0:367_0: Hatthipoto hatthicchāpo, bhiṅko ca kalabho bhave.
anya-e0804n0:368_0: Caja cāge. Cajati. Pariccajati. Cāgo. Pariccāgo. Cajanaṁ. Cajaṁ, cajanto. Cajamāno.
anya-e0804n0:369_0: Sanja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṁ. Sañcati. Satto. Sajanaṁ, satti. Āsatti. Sajituṁ. Sajitvā.
anya-e0804n0:371_0: Bhaji bhajjane. Bhajjanaṁ tāpakaraṇaṁ. Tilāni bhajjati. Purisena bhajjamānāni tilāni.
anya-e0804n0:372_0: Ejabheja bhāja dittiyaṁ. Ditti sobhā. Ejati. Bhejati. Bhājati.
anya-e0804n0:373_7: Atha vā tejoti tejanaṁ usmā uṇhattaṁ tāpo.
anya-e0804n0:376_0: Rāja dittiyaṁ bhāja ca. Rājati. Bhājati. Rājā. Rājinī. Vanarāji. Rājitvā.
anya-e0804n0:378_0: Ne’tassa iti vatvāna, dve janā kalahaṁ karuṁ.
anya-e0804n0:379_0: Ettha ca paṭhamapādassa dutiyapade ‘‘me ahi mahī’’ti chedo ‘‘puttā me atthi puttā matthī’’ti viya.
anya-e0804n0:379_1: ‘‘Mahi arāja mahārājā’’ti ca chedo ‘‘yopi ayaṁ yopāya’’nti viya.
anya-e0804n0:379_2: Ettha arājasaddo ‘‘atikaramakarācariyā’’ti ettha akarīti atthavācako akarasaddo viya ākhyātaparokkhāvibhattiko daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:379_4: Ayaṁ pana gāthāya piṇḍattho ‘‘mahārāja me ahi arāja,
anya-e0804n0:379_6: na etassa iti vatvā dve ahituṇḍikajanā kalahaṁ kariṁsū’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:380_2: Satto rūpādīsu rañjati. Rajanaṁ. Rajako. Rāgo. Virāgo.
anya-e0804n0:380_4: Imassa ca divādigaṇaṁ pattassa ‘‘rajjati virajjatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:381_0: Rāgo lobho tasiṇā ca, taṇhā ejā visattikā;
anya-e0804n0:382_0: Satti āsatti mucchā ca, lubbhitattañca lubbhanā.
anya-e0804n0:383_0: Kāmo nikāmanā icchā, nikanti ca niyanti ca;
anya-e0804n0:384_0: Vanañca vanatho ceva, apekkhā bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0804n0:385_0: Anurodho ca sārāgo, saṅgo paṅko ca sibbinī;
anya-e0804n0:388_4: Dānañca piyavacanañca atthacariyā ca samānattatā cāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi attani mahājanaṁ rañjetītipi rājā.
anya-e0804n0:389_0: Rājā bhūpati devo ca, manujindo disampati;
anya-e0804n0:400_0: Bhaja sevāyaṁ. Bhajati. Bhajanā. Sambhajanā. Bhatti. Sambhatti. Bhattā.
anya-e0804n0:401_4: bhavo vā yattha labbhatī’’ti gāthāyaṁ saṅgatasaddena samodhānaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:401_10: Devamanussehi bhagavā yajiyati. Ijjati. Yiṭṭhaṁ. Yañño. Yāgo.
anya-e0804n0:402_0: Majja saṁsuddhiyaṁ. Majjati. Bāhiraṁ parimajjati. Bhūmiṁ sammajjati. Majjanaṁ. Sammajjanī.
anya-e0804n0:403_4: Ayaṁ pana pāḷi ‘‘tato tvaṁ moggallāna uṭṭhāyāsanā udakena akkhīni paniñjitvā disā anulokeyyāsī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:405_0: Bhaja pāke. Tilāni bhajjati. Bhajjamānā tilāni ca.
anya-e0804n0:406_0: Uju ajjave. Ajjavaṁ ujubhāvo. Ojati. Uju.
anya-e0804n0:409_11: Ettha ca vibhujatīti chindati. Bhogo. Bhogī. Ābhogo.
anya-e0804n0:409_13: Ettha ca bhogoti bhujayati kuṭilaṁ kariyatīti bhogo,
anya-e0804n0:410_3: Tassattho ‘‘idaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ tathāgatagandhahatthino mahāvajirañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇadantehi rañjitaṁ ārañjitaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:410_5: Rañjitanti hi rañjati vijjhati etthāti ruñjitaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:410_7: ‘‘Idaṁ nesaṁ padakkanta’’ntiādimhi viya etassa saddassa siddhi veditabbā adhikaraṇatthasambhavato.
anya-e0804n0:411_2: tenassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na santi. Vejati. Vego.
anya-e0804n0:411_4: Saṁvigo vegena palāyi. Nadīvego. Ūmivego , vātavego.
anya-e0804n0:411_7: Divādigaṇaṁ pana pattassa ‘‘vijjati saṁvijjati ubbijjatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti dvigaṇikattā.
anya-e0804n0:412_0: Lajja lajjane. Lajjati. Lajjā. Lajjāti hirī. Yā ‘‘viriḷanā’’tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:414_7: Tattha kujjati nikujjatīti imāni ‘‘carati vicaratī’’ti padāni viya samānatthāni,
anya-e0804n0:415_0: Mujja osīdane. Mujjati. Nimujjati. Nimuggo. Ummuggo.
anya-e0804n0:420_5: Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena vā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena vā jhāyanasīlo cintanasīlo.
anya-e0804n0:420_8: na dānime jhāyantīti kho vāseṭṭha ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakātveva tatiyaṁ akkharaṁ upanibbatta’’nti evaṁ paṭhamakappikakāle
anya-e0804n0:420_11: mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṁsāvacanaṁ katvā voharantīti.
anya-e0804n0:420_12: Ayaṁ panattho ‘‘adhipubbassa i ajjhayane’’ti dhātussa vasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:420_13: Evaṁ adhipubbassa idhātussa vasena imassa dhātussa atthaparivattanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:421_0: Jhe dittiyaṁ. Dīpo jhāyati, dārūni jhāyanti. Ettha jhāyatīti jalati. Jhāyanajalanasaddā hi ekatthā.
anya-e0804n0:423_0: Ujjha ussagge. Ussaggo chaḍḍanaṁ. Ujjhati. Ujjhitaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:426_0: Ñā avabodhane. ‘‘Ñāti, ñanti, ñāsi. Ñātu, ñantu. Ñeyya,
anya-e0804n0:426_1: ñeyyu’’ntiādīni yathāpāvacanaṁ gahetabbāni. Ñāti, ñātako, añño, ñattaṁ, ñatti, paññatti, viññatti, saññatti, saññā, saññāṇaṁ, paññā, paññāṇaṁ, ñāṇaṁ, viññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:427_4: Aññoti diṭṭhadhammikādayo atthe na ñāti na jānātīti añño,
anya-e0804n0:427_16: tasmā ñātītiādīni ākhyātikapadāni diṭṭhāniyeva honti nayavasena.
anya-e0804n0:427_17: Tathā hi aññātīti ettha āiti upasaggo,
anya-e0804n0:427_18: so parassakkharassa saññoguccāraṇicchāya rassaṁ katvā niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0804n0:429_0: Ettha ñattīti māretīti vā tosetīti vā nisetīti vā attho.
anya-e0804n0:429_1: Ayañca ñattisaddo ‘‘vatti etāyāti vācā’’ti ettha vattisaddo viya ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:429_2: Tathā ādatteti ettha vibhattibhūtassa tesaddassa viya vibhattibhūtassa tisaddassa saññogabhāvo ca dhātuantassarassa rassattañca.
anya-e0804n0:429_3: Manuññanti manaṁ ābhuso ñeti tosetīti manuññaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:429_4: Ayamattho manasaddūpapadassa āpubbassimassa ñādhātussa vasena daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:429_5: Paññattīti nānappakārato pavattinivāraṇena akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ñatti māraṇaṁ paññatti.
anya-e0804n0:429_6: Atha vā dhammaṁ suṇantānaṁ dhammadesanāya citte anekavidhena somanassuppādanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:429_8: tathā sotūnaṁ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca paññāpanaṁ paññattīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:439_0: Laṭa bālye ca. Pubbāpekkhāya cakāro. Laṭati. Lāṭo.
anya-e0804n0:442_0: Khiṭa uttāsane. Kheṭati, ākheṭako, kheṭo, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito.
anya-e0804n0:444_0: Jaṭaghaṭa saṅghāte. Jaṭati. Jaṭā, jaṭilo, jaṭī.
anya-e0804n0:445_0: Bhaṭa bhattiyaṁ. Bhaṭati. Bhaṭo. Vetanaṁ bhaṭako yathā.
anya-e0804n0:446_0: Taṭa ussaye. Ussayo āroho ubbedho. Taṭati. Taṭo, giritaṭo, nadītaṭo, taṭī, taṭaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:449_2: ‘‘Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakaṁ ādāyā’’tiādīsu yasmiṁ kismiñci bhājane.
anya-e0804n0:450_0: Haṭa dittiyaṁ. Haṭati. Hāṭakaṁ, haṭakaṁ. Yaṁ jātarūpaṁ haṭakanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:455_0: Aṭa paṭa iṭa kiṭa kaṭa gatiyaṁ. Aṭati. Paṭati. Eṭati. Keṭati. Kaṭati.
anya-e0804n0:456_0: Paṭo coḷo sāṭako ca, vāso vasanamaṁsukaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:461_0: Ruṭi luṭi theyye. Ruṇṭati. Luṇṭati. Ruṇṭako. Luṇṭako.
anya-e0804n0:466_0: Ghaṭa cetāyaṁ. Ghaṭati. Ghaṭo. Ghaṭo vuccati kumbho. Imāni tadabhidhānāni –
anya-e0804n0:467_0: Ghaṭo kumbho ghaṭī kumbhī, tuṇḍikiro tu ukkhalī;
anya-e0804n0:469_0: Caṭa bhaṭa paribhāsane deṭa ca. Caṭati. Bhaṭati. Deṭati.
anya-e0804n0:472_0: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭa chedane. Cuṭati. Chuṭati. Kuṭati.
anya-e0804n0:479_1: Gatinivatti uppajjamānassa gamanassupacchedo. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti. Tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:479_8: Tiṭṭheyya. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhu. Aṭṭhā, aṭṭhū, aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṁsu.
anya-e0804n0:480_1: ‘‘Kiṁ panāyasmā devānamindo kammaṁ katvā imaṁ ṭhānaṁ patto’’tiādīsu hi issariye dissati.
anya-e0804n0:480_5: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṁ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena,
anya-e0804n0:486_0: Evaṁvidhaṁ tuṁpaccayantādivibhāgaṁ sabbattha yathārahaṁ vattukāmāpi gantha vitthārabhayena na vadāma.
anya-e0804n0:486_1: Avuttopi īdiso vibhāgo nayānusārena yathāsambhavaṁ sabbattha yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:487_3: thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṁ bhikkhūti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:491_1: Balakkāro nāma attano balena yathājjhāsayaṁ dabbalassa abhibhavanaṁ. Sāṭhati. Sāṭho.
anya-e0804n0:492_0: Uṭha ruṭha luṭha upaghāte. Oṭhati. Roṭhati. Loṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:494_0: Saṭha ketave ca. Pubbatthesu cakāro. Saṭhati. Saṭho saṭhoti kerāṭiko vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:496_0: Kuṭhi luṭhi ālassiye ca. Cakāro pubbatthe ca. Kuṇṭhati. Kuṇṭho. Luṇṭhati. Luṇṭho.
anya-e0804n0:498_0: Ruṭhi luṭhi aṭhi gatiyaṁ. Ruṇṭhati. Luṇṭhati. Aṇṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:499_0: Veṭha veṭhane. Veṭhati, nibbeṭhati. Veṭhanaṁ, nibbeṭhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:502_0: Eṭha heṭha vibādhāyaṁ. Eṭhati. Heṭhati. Viheṭhati. Viheṭhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:508_0: Ḍi vihāyasagatiyaṁ gamanamatte ca. Ḍeti, ḍayati. Ḍemāno.
anya-e0804n0:510_0: Ito bahiddhā pāsaṇḍā, diṭṭhīsu pasīdanti te;
anya-e0804n0:511_0: Na tesaṁ dhammaṁ rocemi, na te dhammassa kovidā.
anya-e0804n0:512_0: Ettha ca pāsaṇḍāti pāsaṁ ḍentīti pāsaṇḍā,
anya-e0804n0:512_2: Atha vā taṇhāpāsaṁ diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti uḍḍentīti pāsaṇḍā.
anya-e0804n0:517_0: Huḍi piḍi saṅghāte. Huṇḍati. Piṇḍati. Piṇḍo.
anya-e0804n0:520_0: Vaḍi maḍi veṭhane. Vaṇḍati. Maṇḍati. Maṇḍalaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:523_0: Tuḍi toḷane. Tuṇḍati. Tuṇḍo. Tuṇḍenādāya gaccheyya.
anya-e0804n0:525_0: Caḍi kope. Caṇḍati. Caṇḍo. Caṇḍālo, caṇḍikkaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:528_2: Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu paṇḍati gacchati dukkhādīnaṁ pīḷanādikampi ākāraṁ jānātīti ‘‘paṇḍā’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:528_3: Paṇḍitoti paṇḍāya ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n0:528_4: Atha vā sañjātā paṇḍā etassāti paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n0:535_0: Kaḍḍha ākaḍḍhane. Kaḍḍhati, ākaḍḍhati, nikaḍḍhati. Akāmā parikaḍḍhanti, ulūkaññeva vāyasā.
anya-e0804n0:538_0: Aṇa raṇa vaṇa bhaṇa maṇa kaṇa sadde. Aṇati.
anya-e0804n0:538_1: Aṇako brāhmaṇo. Raṇati. Raṇaṁ. Vaṇati. Vāṇako. Bhaṇati. Bhāṇako. Maṇati. Maṇiko. Kaṇati. Kāṇo.
anya-e0804n0:539_0: Brāhmaṇo sottiyo vippo, bhovādī brahmabandhu ca;
anya-e0804n0:541_0: Raṇasaddo ‘‘saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammā’’tiādīsu kilesesu vattati.
anya-e0804n0:541_1: Kilesā hi raṇanti kandanti etehīti raṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:544_1: Raṇaṁ katvāti hi yuddhaṁ katvāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:544_3: dhāviṁsu te aṭṭhadisā samantato’’ti ettha cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe vattati.
anya-e0804n0:544_4: Raṇaṁ karontāti hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṁ karontāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:544_5: Evaṁ atthavivaraṇampi saddasaṅkhātamatthaṁ antoyeva katvā adhippāyatthavasena kataṁ,
anya-e0804n0:554_0: Ghiṇi ghuṇi ghaṇi gahaṇe. Ghiṇṇati. Ghuṇṇati. Ghaṇṇati.
anya-e0804n0:561_0: Pīṇa pīṇane. Pīṇanaṁ paripuṇṇatā. Pīṇati. Pīṇo divā na bhuñjati, pīṇorakkhaṁsabāhu.
anya-e0804n0:564_0: Saṇa abyattasadde. Saṇati. Saṇateva brahmāraññaṁ. Saṇatevāti nadati viya.
anya-e0804n0:566_2: Ettha ca nipuṇasaṇhasukhumasaddā vevacanasaddā kusalachekadakkhasaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:571_0: Phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca. Phuṇati. Aṅgārakāsuṁ apare phuṇanti.
anya-e0804n0:577_7: ‘‘Gotamo kassapo’’ti hi ādinā pavattamānaṁ gaṁ vacanaṁ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṁsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:577_8: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
anya-e0804n0:577_10: tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:577_12: Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṁ tassa kulassa ādipurisasammuditaṁ taṁkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṁ sāmaññarūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:578_0: Nakkhattanti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:578_2: Tathā hi assayujo bharaṇī kattikā rohaṇī migasiro addā punabbasu phusso assaliso māgho pubbaphagguṇī
anya-e0804n0:578_3: uttaraphagguṇī hattho cittaṁ svāti visākhā anurādhā jeṭṭhā mūlaṁ pubbāsaḷhaṁ uttarāsaḷhaṁ sāvaṇaṁ dhanasiṭṭhā
anya-e0804n0:578_4: satabhisattaṁ pubbabhaddapadaṁ uttarabhaddapadaṁ revatī cāti sattavīsati nakkhattāni.
anya-e0804n0:578_5: Tāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṁ īsakampi na vijahanti kiñci sīghaṁ kiñci dandhaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:578_8: etto ito cāti evaṁ visamagatiyā agantvā yantacakke paṭipāṭiyā yojitāni viya samappamāṇagatiyā attano
anya-e0804n0:578_10: Evaṁ imāni nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyanti rakkhantīti nakkhattānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:578_11: Porāṇā pana kharadhātuvasena ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī’’ti āvocuṁ,
anya-e0804n0:578_12: ‘‘nakkhattaṁ joti rikkhaṁ taṁ’’ iccetāni nakkhattatārakānaṁ nāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:578_13: ‘‘Uḷu tārā tārakā’’ti imāni pana sabbāsampi tārakānaṁ sādhāraṇanāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:579_3: Īkārantavasena vuttattā asmā dhātuto saki saṅkāyanti dhātuto viya niggahītāgamo na hoti.
anya-e0804n0:581_3: tasmā bhavābhavaṁ dhāvanto jātijarābyādhimaraṇādibhedaṁ anekavihitaṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ atati satataṁ gacchati
anya-e0804n0:581_6: attabhāvo’’ti ca ‘‘sukhadukkhaṁ adati anubhavatīti attā’’ti ca ‘‘attamanoti pītisomanassena gahitamano’’ti ca attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0804n0:581_7: yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati,
anya-e0804n0:581_8: tattha tattha tathā tathā atthassa gahetabbatoti.
anya-e0804n0:583_2: Idha anta saddassa atthuddhāro vuccate ‘‘antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariya’’nti ettha dvattiṁsākārantogadhaṁ kuṇapantaṁ antaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n0:583_4: Haritantaṁ vā’’ti ettha antimamariyādanto anto nāma.
anya-e0804n0:587_6: Etāni hi taṁdvārārammaṇacittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti etesūti ‘‘āyatanānī’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:587_7: Ettha pana nītanudhātūnaṁ vasenapi āyatanasaddattho vattabbo siyā,
anya-e0804n0:588_0: Āyatanasaddo nivāsaṭṭhāne ākare samosaraṇaṭṭhāne sañjātidese kāraṇe ca.
anya-e0804n0:588_1: Tathā hi ‘‘loke issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana’’ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhāne āyatanasaddo vattati.
anya-e0804n0:588_6: ‘‘Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane’’tiādīsu kāraṇe vattatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:589_0: Nivāse ākāre ceva, jātidese ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n0:591_3: kāḷo bako iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā’’ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ titthiyasatthaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:591_5: yañca sandhāya bodhisatto asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito ‘‘na seve lokāyatikaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:591_7: Āyatiṁ hitaṁ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṁ, kintaṁ?
anya-e0804n0:591_9: Tañhi ganthaṁ nissāya sattā puññakriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.
anya-e0804n0:591_13: lohitassa rattattā’ti evamādinayappavattaṁ paralokanibbānānaṁ paṭisedhakaṁ vitaṇḍasatthasippa’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:592_0: Yuta juta bhāsane. Bhāsanaṁ udīraṇaṁ. Yotati. Jotati.
anya-e0804n0:593_4: Ettha ca jutīti āloko siri vā.
anya-e0804n0:593_7: Vuttampi ceta sirimāvimāna vatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘jotīti candimasūriyanakkhattatārakānaṁ sādhāraṇanāma’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:593_8: Atha vā ‘‘joti jotiparāyaṇo’’ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulādīsu jātattā ca rūpasobhāyuttattā ca,
anya-e0804n0:594_3: tathāpi idha nīlapītādīsu setavaṇṇoyeva gahetabbo payogadassanavasena. Setati.
anya-e0804n0:595_0: Setaṁ sitaṁ suci sukkaṁ, paṇḍaraṁ dhavalampi ca;
anya-e0804n0:597_0: Vatu vattane. Vattati, pavattati, saṁvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. Pavattaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:600_0: Kita ñāṇe. Ketati. Ketanaṁ, ketako, saṅketo.
anya-e0804n0:603_0: Catī hiṁsāgandhesu. Īkārantattā imasmā niggahītāgamo na hoti. Catati.
anya-e0804n0:606_3: ‘‘Chetvā vanaṁ vanathañcā’’ti ettha hi mahantā rukkhā vanaṁ nāma,
anya-e0804n0:606_4: khuddakā pana tasmiṁ vane ṭhitattā vanatho nāma vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:607_0: Thu thutiyaṁ. Thavati, abhitthavati. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuti, abhitthuti.
anya-e0804n0:608_0: Yadi hi rūpinī siyā, paññā me vasumatī na sameyya;
anya-e0804n0:611_0: Thavanā ca pasaṁsā ca, silāghā vaṇṇanā thuti;
anya-e0804n0:613_7: Thīyati saṅghātaṁ gacchati gabbho etissāti thī.
anya-e0804n0:613_8: Ācariyā pana itthīsaddasseva evaṁ nibbacanaṁ vadanti,
anya-e0804n0:614_0: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti thī iti no ruci;
anya-e0804n0:615_0: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti itthīti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n0:617_0: Ayaṁ vinicchayo patto, nicchayaṁ bho suṇātha me.
anya-e0804n0:620_0: Appānaṁ bahutā ñāye, gahite sati yujjati;
anya-e0804n0:621_0: Tathā hi ‘‘dve duve, taṇhā, tasiṇā’’ti nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:624_0: Icchatīti nare itthī, icchāpetīti vā pana;
anya-e0804n0:627_0: Itthī thī vanitā nārī, abalā bhīru sundarī;
anya-e0804n0:628_0: Kantā sīmaninī mātu-gāmo piyā ca kāminī.
anya-e0804n0:631_0: Gorī ca dārikā kaññā, kumārī ca kumārikā;
anya-e0804n0:633_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:633_4: Atho jaraṁ appattā yuvatītipi taruṇītipi māṇavikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:633_5: Jaraṁ pattā pana therītipi mahallikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:634_3: rājaputtī ca dārika’’nti ca ‘‘acchā kaṇhājinaṁ kañña’’nti ca imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ vasena yā itthī dārikāsaddena vattabbā,
anya-e0804n0:634_9: niccaṁ nigaḷamaṇḍite’’ti ca imāsaṁ pana pāḷīnaṁ vasena yā itthī dārikāsadena vattabbā,
anya-e0804n0:634_13: Apicettha ‘‘rājakaññā rucā nāmā’’ti ca ‘‘tato maddimpi nhāpesuṁ,
anya-e0804n0:634_14: sivikaññā samāgatā’’ti ca imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ dassanato yā anibbiddhā vā hotu nibbiddhā vā,
anya-e0804n0:635_1: yaṁ tumhehi ‘‘aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccatī’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:635_3: jātiyā aṭṭhavassiko’’ti vacanato aṭṭhavasso dārako hotu,
anya-e0804n0:635_5: ramamānaṁ sake pure’’ti pāḷiyaṁ pana puttadārehi saṁvaddho vessantaramahārājā kathaṁ ‘‘kumāro’’ti vattuṁ yujjissati dvādasavassātikkantattā?
anya-e0804n0:635_7: Bhagavā hi dhammissarattā vohārakusalatāya ca yaṁ yaṁ veneyyajanānurūpaṁ desanaṁ desetuṁ icchati,
anya-e0804n0:635_9: tasmā bhagavatā tassa mātāpitūnaṁ atthitaṁ sandhāya kumāraparihārena vaddhitattañca evaṁ desanā katā.
anya-e0804n0:635_10: Tathā hi āyasmā kumārakassapo kumāraparihārena vaddhitattā mahallakopi samāno kumārakassapotveva vohariyati.
anya-e0804n0:635_11: ‘‘Na vāyaṁ kumārako mattamaññāsī’’ti ettha pana sirasmiṁ palitesu jātesupi āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āyasmā
anya-e0804n0:635_12: mahākassapo tasmiṁ there adhimattavissāso hutvā komāravādena ovadanto kumārakoti avocāti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:635_13: Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:637_0: Kuthi puthi luthi hiṁsāsaṁkilesesu. Kunthati. Kuntho,
anya-e0804n0:638_1: Nāthadhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsīsane cāti catūsvatthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n0:638_5: ‘‘sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkheyyā’tiādinā taṁ taṁ hitapaṭipattiṁ yācatīti attho,
anya-e0804n0:638_6: paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte vā guṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro bhagavā ‘nātho’ti vuccatīti nāthatīti nātho’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:638_7: Saddasatthavidū pana tesu catūsu atthesu nātha nādha iti dhātudvayaṁ paṭhanti.
anya-e0804n0:638_8: Attanobhāsattā pana tassa ‘‘nāthate nādhate’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:639_1: evaṁ sante yo koci yācako daliddo,
anya-e0804n0:639_4: so na nāthati na yācatīti anātho siyā’’ti? Na,
anya-e0804n0:639_5: nāthasaddo hi yācanatthādīsu pavattamāno lokasaṅketavasena uttamapurisesu nirūḷho,
anya-e0804n0:639_7: tena taṁ taṁ hitapaṭipattiṁ yācatīti nāthasaddassattho vutto.
anya-e0804n0:639_10: Natthi nātho etassāti vā anātho’’ti dabbapaṭisedhavasena,
anya-e0804n0:639_11: na pana ‘‘na nāthati na yācatīti anātho’’ti dhātuatthapaṭisedhavasena.
anya-e0804n0:639_12: Yo hi aññassa saraṇaṁ gati patiṭṭhā hoti, so nātho,
anya-e0804n0:639_13: yo ca aññassa saraṇaṁ gati patiṭṭhā na hoti,
anya-e0804n0:639_14: nāpi attano añño saraṇaṁ gati patiṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0804n0:639_18: Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṁ imasmiṁ ṭhāne ‘‘lokanātho tuvaṁ eko,
anya-e0804n0:639_19: saraṇaṁ sabbapāṇina’’nti ca ‘‘anāthānaṁ bhavaṁ nātho’’ti ca –
anya-e0804n0:642_1: Yasmā pana sāsane ca loke ca yācako ‘‘nātho’’ti na vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:642_8: Tasmā paññavatā sabbesu ṭhānesu dhātuatthamattena lokasamaññaṁ anatidhāvitvā yathānurūpaṁ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:646_6: aññaṁ janapadaṁ gato’’ti ca ‘‘idhekacco katthī hoti vikatthī,
anya-e0804n0:646_7: so katthati ‘ahamasmi sīlasampannoti vā vattasampannoti vā vikatthatī’ti’’ ca ādayo payogā.
anya-e0804n0:648_0: Sutha kutha katha hiṁsāyaṁ. Sothati. Kothati. Kathati.
anya-e0804n0:649_2: So duvidho mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo pakatimaggo ca paṇḍitehinibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbo paṭipadāsaṅkhāto ariyamaggo cāti.
anya-e0804n0:649_3: Tattha pakatimaggo uppannakiccākiccehi janehi pathiyati gacchiyatīti patho,
anya-e0804n0:649_4: paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuraṁ gantukāmehi kulaputtehi saddhāpātheyyaṁ gahetvā pathiyati paṭipajjiyatīti patho.
anya-e0804n0:649_5: Atha vā pātheti kārakaṁ puggalaṁ gameti nibbānaṁ sampāpetīti vā patho ,
anya-e0804n0:657_9: Imāni kāritapadāni hetukattupadānīti ca vuccanti taddīpakattā.
anya-e0804n0:657_14: Ayañca dā dāneti dhātu sāsanānurūpasutivasena divādigaṇaṁ patvā supanakriyaṁ vadanto ‘‘dāyati niddāyati
anya-e0804n0:657_16: Dānamavakhaṇḍanañca vadanto ‘‘diyati dānaṁ dātta’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati.
anya-e0804n0:657_17: Suddhiṁvadanto ‘‘dāyati vedāyati vodāna’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati,
anya-e0804n0:657_18: imasmiṁ pana bhūvādigaṇe dānaṁ vadanto āpubbavasena gahaṇañca vadanto ‘‘dadāti deti ādadāti ādeti dānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:657_20: Tathā kucchitagamanaṁ vadanto ‘‘dāti suddāti suddo suddī’’ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayatīti ayaṁ viseso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:658_0: Idānissa nāmapadāni tumantādīni brūma. ‘‘Dānaṁ, deyyaṁ, dātabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:658_2: dakkhiṇā’’ iccādīni, ‘‘dātuṁ, padātuṁ, dātave, padātave, datvā, datvāna, dadātuna, daditvā,
anya-e0804n0:658_3: daditvāna, dadiya, dajjā, dadiyāna, ādātuṁ, ādāya,
anya-e0804n0:659_1: dadanti etenāti atthe na deyyadhammo dānacetanā ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:659_5: ‘‘Dānaṁ dinna’’ntiādīsu hi dinnasaddaṭṭhāne dattasaddo na dissati,
anya-e0804n0:661_0: ‘‘Manasā dānaṁ mayā dinnaṁ’’, iti dinnapadaṁ viya.
anya-e0804n0:664_0: Tasmā ‘‘devadatto’’tiādīsu ‘‘devena dinno’’ti samāsaṁ katvā paṇṇattivacanattā dinnasaddassa dattādeso kātabbo sāsanānurūpena.
anya-e0804n0:664_1: Upari hi ‘‘dinnassa datto kvaci paṇṇattiya’’nti lakkhaṇaṁ passissatha.
anya-e0804n0:675_0: Ediso pāḷiyaṁ natthi, nayo tasmā na so varo;
anya-e0804n0:685_0: Koci pana saddasatthavidū garu evaṁ saddaracanamakāsi –
anya-e0804n0:690_0: Ettha ca brahmadattanti idaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:690_2: Pāḷinayañhipatvā ‘‘brahmadattiya’’nti vā ‘‘brahmadinna’’nti vā ‘‘devadattiya’’nti vā ‘‘devadinna’’nti vā rūpena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:690_3: Tathā hi ‘‘bodhisatto ca maddī ca sammodamānā sakkadattiye assame vasiṁsū’’ti pāḷinayānurūpo aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati.
anya-e0804n0:693_0: Ayaṁ nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā. Atra pana paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇavasena yathārahaṁ padakkamo bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:694_0: Dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma, dadāmase. Dadeyya, dade, dajjā.
anya-e0804n0:698_0: Na hi sabbappakārena, pāḷiyo paṭibhanti no.
anya-e0804n0:699_0: Tattha asmākaṁ khantiyā ‘‘dajjā dajja’’ntiādīni yyakārasahiteyeva sattamiyā padarūpe sijjhanti.
anya-e0804n0:699_1: ‘‘Dajjā sappuriso dāna’’nti ettha hi ‘‘dajjā idaṁ ‘‘dadeyyā’’ti padarūpaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare
anya-e0804n0:699_2: saralopaṁ katvā tato tiṇṇaṁ byañjanānaṁ saṁyogañca tīsusaññogabyañjanesu dvinnaṁ sarūpānamekassa lopañca
anya-e0804n0:699_3: dyakārasaññogassa ca jakāradvayaṁ katvā tato dīghavasenuccāritabbattā animittaṁ dīghabhāvaṁ katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n0:699_12: Evaṁ duvidhesu sandhīsu ‘‘dajjā’’ti ayaṁ vaṇṇasandhi eva.
anya-e0804n0:701_0: ‘‘Ayaṁ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṁ parittakaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:703_2: Idaṁ pana datvāsaddena samānatthaṁ ‘‘dadiyya’’ iti padarūpaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṁ katvā
anya-e0804n0:703_3: saññogesu sarūpalopañca tato dyakārasaññogassa jjakāradvayaṁ dīghattañca katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n0:704_1: Tathā hi ‘‘petānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ dajjā’’ti ca ‘‘dakkhiṇā dajjā’’ti ca dve pāṭhā dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:704_2: Tattha pacchimassa dajjāti dātabbāti attho kammani yapaccayavasena.
anya-e0804n0:704_3: Idha pana dādhātuto yapaccayaṁ katvā dhātussa dvittañca pubbassa rassattañca tato yakāre pare saralopaṁ
anya-e0804n0:704_4: saññogabhāvañca jjakāradvayañca itthiliṅgattā āpaccayādiñca katvā ‘‘dajjā’’ti nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n0:704_5: Evaṁ ‘‘dajjā dadeyyā’’ti ca ‘‘dajjā dadiyya datvā’’ti ca ‘‘dajjā dātabbā’’ti ca etāni paccekaṁ pariyāyavacanāni bhavanti. ‘‘Dajjuṁ. Dajjāsi, dajjātha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjāvho,
anya-e0804n0:704_6: dajja’’nti etānipi ‘‘dadeyyuṁ dadeyyāsī’’tiādinā padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṁ saññogesu
anya-e0804n0:704_8: Etesu dajjāsīti yaṁ rūpaṁ tassāvayavassa ākārassa ekāraṁ katvā aparampi ‘‘dajjesī’’ti rūpaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:705_0: Acinteyyānubhāvassa hi sammāsambuddhassa pāḷinayo acinteyyoyeva hoti,
anya-e0804n0:705_4: Tathā hi ‘‘khattiyā titthiyā cetiyānī’’tiādīsu yakāre pare saralopo bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:705_8: Tathā ‘‘sākacchati taccha’’nti etthāpi ‘‘saha kathayatī’’tivā ‘‘saṁkathayatī’’ti vā ‘‘tathya’’nti ca
anya-e0804n0:705_10: saṁsadde ca niggahītalopaṁ katvā sakāragatassa sarassa dīghaṁ katvā yakāre pare saralopaṁ katvā tato
anya-e0804n0:705_11: thyakārasaññogassa cchayugaṁ katvā visabhāgasaññoge eko ekassa sabhāgattamāpajjati.
anya-e0804n0:705_17: sammā so loke paribbajeyyā’’ti savikapāni payogāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:705_18: ‘‘Najjā’’tiādīsupi ‘‘nadiyā’’tiādīni padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā vaṇṇasandhivasena yakāre pare lopavidhi labbhatiyeva.
anya-e0804n0:705_20: upari ca etesaṁ sādhanatthaṁ ‘‘saralopo yamanarādīsū’’tiādīni lakkhaṇāni bhavissanti. Tattha –
anya-e0804n0:708_2: dajjāhaṁ dakarakkhino’’ti ettha dajjanti padassa ‘‘dammī’’ti vattamānāvasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n0:708_4: Ācariyā hi ‘‘sattamīpayogo aya’’nti jānantāpi ‘‘kadāci aññe parikappatthampi gaṇheyyu’’nti āsaṅkāya evaṁ vivaraṇamakaṁsu.
anya-e0804n0:708_6: na dajjaṁ dakarakkhino’’ti ettha na dajjanti padassa ‘‘nāhaṁ dakarakkhassa dassāmī’’ti bhavissantīvasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n0:708_8: anāgataṁ pana paṭicca vattabbatthattā evaṁ vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0804n0:708_9: ‘‘Neva dajjaṁ mahosadha’’nti ettha pana ‘‘na tveva dadeyya’’nti sattamīpayogavaseneva vivaraṇaṁ katanti.
anya-e0804n0:709_2: kassapo iti maṁ vidū’’tiādīsu vidūsaddena samaṁ. Dade, dadittha, dadaṁ, dadimha. Dadittha, dadire. Dadittho, dadivho.
anya-e0804n0:710_0: Ettha ca daditthoti idaṁ ‘‘sañjagghittho mayā saha.
anya-e0804n0:710_3: Iminā nayena sabbattha labbhamānavasena sadisatā upaparikkhitabbā. Dadaṁ, dadimhe.
anya-e0804n0:711_6: Iti anakārapubbampi rūpaṁ gahetabbaṁ ‘‘yesaṁ no na dadamhase’’ti dassanato.
anya-e0804n0:712_1: adadittha. Adadiṁ, adadimhā. Adadā, adadū. Adadase,
anya-e0804n0:714_0: ‘‘Adadisā, dadissā, adadissaṁsu, dadissaṁsu’’ iccādi ca sabbaṁ neyyaṁ. Kālātipattisahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:715_0: Aparānipi vattamānādisahitarūpāni bhavanti. Deti, denti. Desi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma.
anya-e0804n0:715_3: Hiyuttanīnayo pana ajjatanīnayo ca koci koci pasiddho pāḷiyaṁ āgatattā,
anya-e0804n0:716_0: Tathā ādadāti, ādadanti. Ādadāsi, ādadātha. Ādadāmi, ādadāma.
anya-e0804n0:717_0: Dākucchite gamane. Dāti. Suddāti. Suddo, suddī.
anya-e0804n0:717_2: parapothanādiluddācārakammunā dārukammādikhuddācārakammunā ca lahuṁ lahuṁ kucchitaṁ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:717_3: Tathā hi su iti sīghatthe nipāto,
anya-e0804n0:718_1: Ettha ca davati gacchati mūlakkhandhasākhāviṭapapattapallavapupphaphalehi vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇātīti dumo.
anya-e0804n0:720_2: Tathā hi ‘‘bālo abyatto nappaṭibalo anuyuñjiyamāno anuyogaṁ dātu’’nti ettha dātunti padassa sodhetunti attho.
anya-e0804n0:720_7: Tasmā ‘‘ācariyassa anuyogaṁ datvā bārāṇasiṁ paccāgacchī’’tiādīsupi anuyogaṁ datvāti anuyogaṁ sodhetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:720_8: Tathā hi pubbācariyehi ‘‘anuyogadāpanattha’’nti etasmiṁ padese esoyevattho vibhāvito. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0804n0:720_10: Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṁ nadanto atthato anuyogaṁ sodheti nāma,
anya-e0804n0:720_18: Samantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇa saṁvaṇṇanāyampi pubbācariyehi ‘‘dānaṁ datvāti taṁ cetanaṁ pariyodāpetvā’’ti sodhanattho vutto.
anya-e0804n0:720_19: Dullabhā ayaṁ nīti sādhukaṁ citte ṭhapetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:721_2: Tattha dānanti duggatito dāyati rakkhatīti dānaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:721_4: Uddānanti vuttassa atthassa vakkhamānassa vā vippakiṇṇabhāvena nassituṁ adatvā uddhaṁ dānaṁ rakkhaṇaṁ uddānaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:723_2: ‘‘Khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā’’ti visuṁ bhojanīyassa vacanato khādanaṁ nāma khajjassa vā khādanīyassa vā bhakkhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:723_6: ‘‘Cīvarāni nassantipi ḍayhantipi undūrehipi khajjantī’’ti ettha viya khajjanti saddo kammattho.
anya-e0804n0:724_0: Badatheriye. Thirabhāvo theriyaṁ, yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Badati. Badarī, badaraṁ. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:727_0: Khada dhitihiṁsāsu ca. Theriyāpekkhāya cakāro. Khadati. Khadiro.
anya-e0804n0:728_0: Gada viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Gadati. Āgadanaṁ, tatho āgado etassāti tathāgato. Suṭṭhu gadatīti sugado.
anya-e0804n0:729_0: Rada vilekhane. Radati. Radano, rado, dāṭhārado. Atra radanoti danto.
anya-e0804n0:730_3: Nada i iti dhātudvayavasena pana ‘‘nadantī gacchatīti nadī’’tipi nibbacanaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:731_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ yā panesā ‘‘nada abyattasadde’ti dhātu tumhehi vuttā,
anya-e0804n0:731_4: Yajjevaṁ ‘‘sīho nadatī’’tiādīsu tiracchānagatādisaddabhāvena avibhāvitatthatāya nadasaddo abyattasaddo hotu,
anya-e0804n0:731_5: ‘‘sīho viya ayaṁ puriso nadatī’’tiādīsu pana manussabhāsāpi abyattasaddo siyāti?
anya-e0804n0:731_6: Tanna viyattāpi samānā manussabhāsā sīho viyāti evaṁ samupekkhāvasena sīhapadatthassāpekkhanato nadasaddena niddisiyati ,
anya-e0804n0:731_9: ‘‘kathañca puggalo gajjitā ca vassitā ca hotī’’ti pāḷiyaṁ gajjanaṁ vassanañca puggale alabbhamānampi
anya-e0804n0:731_11: evameva nibbhayabhāvena sīhanādasadisiyā vācāya niccharaṇato sīho viya nadatīti avibhāvitatthavantena nadasaddena manussabhāsāpi niddisitabbā hoti.
anya-e0804n0:732_3: evaṁ santepi bhagavatā aññenākārena sadisattaṁ vibhāvetuṁ ambaphalūpamādayo vuttā,
anya-e0804n0:732_4: evameva nadasaddo abyattasaddabhāvena tiracchānagatasaddādīsu eva vattabbopi atthantaravibhāvanatthaṁ
anya-e0804n0:732_7: Tathā hi sabhāvato nadasaddenapi vassitasaddādīhipi manussabhāsā niddisitabbā na hotīti.
anya-e0804n0:735_3: sakuṇānañca vassita’’nti vassitasaddavasena payogassa vacanato tadanurūpaṁ niddisituṁ arahatīti mantvā vassitasaddasadisī niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0804n0:735_4: Na hi ‘‘manusso vassatī’’tiādinā visuṁ payogā dissanti,
anya-e0804n0:735_8: sīhanādaṁ nadi kuso’’tiādīsu viya yathārahaṁ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:741_1: Andusaddopanettha itthiliṅgo gahetabbo pāḷiyaṁ itthiliṅgappayogadassanato ‘‘seyyathāpi vāseṭṭha ayaṁ
anya-e0804n0:741_2: aciravatī nadī pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā,
anya-e0804n0:741_3: atha puriso āgaccheyya pāratthiko pāragavesī pāragāmī pāraṁ taritukāmo,
anya-e0804n0:741_4: so orimatīre daḷhāya anduyā pacchābāhaṁ gāḷhabandhanabandho’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:741_5: Tatra andūti yaṁ kiñci bandhanaṁ vā.
anya-e0804n0:741_9: Apica andanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena andu viyātipi andu,
anya-e0804n0:741_11: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘ime kho vāseṭṭha pañca kāmaguṇā ariyassa vinaye andūtipi bandhanantipi vuccantī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:741_15: ‘‘Avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā anvadeva ahirika’’nti pāḷi.
anya-e0804n0:741_17: Anvadi eva anvadevāti kitaviggaho sandhiviggaho ca veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:743_1: So hi indati paresu issariyaṁ pāpuṇātīti indoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:751_0: Evaṁ anekāni nāmāni. Ekopi hi attho anekasaddappavattinimittatāya anekanāmo. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0804n0:752_0: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno magho nāma māṇavo ahosi,
anya-e0804n0:752_2: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno pure dānaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0804n0:752_4: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0804n0:752_6: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno āvāsaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0804n0:752_8: Sakko mahāli devānamindo sahassaṁ atthānaṁ muhuttena cinteti,
anya-e0804n0:752_10: Sakkassa mahāli devānamindassa sujā nāma asurakaññā pajāpati,
anya-e0804n0:752_12: Sakko mahāli devānamindo devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ issariyādhipaccaṁ rajjaṁ kāreti,
anya-e0804n0:754_0: Tathā hi yena pavattinimittena tāvatiṁsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto,
anya-e0804n0:754_5: Yena sampayuttadhammānaṁ pubbaṅgamabhāvena uppannadhammasmiṁ cittasaddo pavatto,
anya-e0804n0:754_7: Na hi vinā kenaci pavattinimittena saddo pavattatīti.
anya-e0804n0:754_8: Ekopi attho sammutyattho ca paramattho ca anekasaddappavttinimittatāya anekanāmoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:755_4: Tathā hi ‘‘nāma’’nti ca ‘‘liṅga’’nti ca saddopi vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:755_7: Asabhāvadhammabhūtaṁ nāmapaññattisaṅkhātaṁ atthesu saddappavattinimittampi vuccati ‘‘nāmagottaṁ na jīrati.
anya-e0804n0:755_9: Iti nāmasaddenapi liṅgasaddenapi saddappavattinimittassa kathanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:755_10: Saddappavattinimittañca nāma lokasaṅketasiddho taṁtaṁvacanatthaniyato sāmaññākāravisesoti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:755_11: So evaṁbhūtoyeva sāmaññākāraviseso nāma paññattīti pubbācariyā vadanti .
anya-e0804n0:755_12: So hi tasmiṁ tasmiṁ atthe saddaṁ nāmeti tassa tassa atthassa nāmasaññaṁ karotīti nāmaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:755_14: Saviññattivikārassa pana saddassa sammutiparamatthasaccānaṁ pakārehi ñāpanato paññattibhāve vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0804n0:755_15: Saddasseva hi ekantena paññattibhāvo icchitabbo ‘‘niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā’’ti ca ‘‘niruttipaṭisambhidā
anya-e0804n0:755_17: Idha pana saddappavattinimittādhikārattā nāmavasena attho pakāsito.
anya-e0804n0:755_18: Evaṁ anekavidhassa sāmaññākāravisesoti pubbācariyehi gahitassa nāmapaññattisaṅkhātassa saddappavattinimittassa
anya-e0804n0:758_0: Evaṁ sabbābhidhānesupi iminā nayena yathārahaṁ attho vibhāvetabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n0:759_0: Vidi avayave. Vindati. Yadi abhidhānamatthi, ‘‘vindo’’ti dissati. Yathā kaṇḍati. Kaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n0:760_0: Khidi avayaveti candaviduno vadanti. Tesaṁ mate ‘‘khindatī’’ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:761_0: Nidi kucchāyaṁ. Kucchāsaddo garahattho. Nindati. Nindā.
anya-e0804n0:765_0: Avaṇṇo aguṇo nindā, garahā ayasopi ca;
anya-e0804n0:766_0: Asiloko akitti ca, asilāghā ca atthuti.
anya-e0804n0:768_0: Sirīva rūpiniṁ disvā, nanditaṁ āsi taṁ kulaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:769_0: Tena nandāti me nāmaṁ, sundaraṁ pavaraṁ ahu.
anya-e0804n0:770_0: Rammaṁ veḷuvanaṁ yena, na diṭṭhaṁ sugatālayaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:771_0: Na tena nandanaṁ diṭṭhaṁ, iti maññe mahesayaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:774_0: Cadi hilādane dittiyañca. Hilādanaṁ sukhanaṁ. Ditti sobhā. Candati. Candano, cando.
anya-e0804n0:775_0: Ettha ca candanassapi anekāni nāmāni – candanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:775_6: Candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasamaṅgitāya sattānaṁ paliḷāhaṁ vūpasamentaṁ sukhaṁ uppādetīti candanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:775_8: sopi candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasampattiyā attano pabhāya sattānaṁ pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamento sukhaṁ uppādetīti candoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:775_9: Atha vā candati dibbati siriyā virocatīti cando.
anya-e0804n0:776_0: Cando nakkhattarājā ca, indu somo nisākaro;
anya-e0804n0:777_0: Candimā mā nisānātho, osadhī so nisāpati.
anya-e0804n0:778_0: Uḷurājā sasaṅko ca, himaraṁsi sasīpi ca;
anya-e0804n0:781_0: Sudhaṁ sudhi dhūpi yūpa-rasmi ceva khamākaro;
anya-e0804n0:782_0: Nakkhatteso ca rajanī-karo subbhaṁsu eva ca.
anya-e0804n0:784_0: Kadi kaladi avhāne rodane ca. Kandati, pakkandati. Pakkanduṁ, kandanto, kalandako.
anya-e0804n0:787_0: Khanda gatisosanesu. Khandati. Khando. Khando nāma eko devo, yo ‘‘kumāro sattidharo’’ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:789_0: Sidi sītiye. Sītiyaṁ sītibhāvo. Sindati. Sosindo, sotatto.
anya-e0804n0:790_0: Vanda abhivādanathutīsu. Vandati, abhivandati. Abhivandanā, vandanaṁ, vandako.
anya-e0804n0:791_0: Ettha pana vandatīti padassa namassati thometi vāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:791_1: Tathā hi suttantaṭīkākāro ‘‘vandeti vandāmi thomemi vā’’ti āha.
anya-e0804n0:794_0: Ettha pana mandoti aññāṇīpi bāladārakopi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:794_1: Tattha aññāṇī mandati aññāṇabhāvena appasaṁsitabbampi puggalaṁ thometīti mando.
anya-e0804n0:794_4: Mandati attano ca paresañca hitāhitaṁ acintento khādanīyabhojanīyādīhi attano kāyaṁ sañjātamedaṁ kurumāno supatīti mando.
anya-e0804n0:794_5: Mandati ayuttaṁ paresaṁ kriyaṁ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena gacchati gaṇhātīti mando.
anya-e0804n0:794_6: Atha vā mandati punappunaṁ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gabbhaṁ gacchatīti mando.
anya-e0804n0:794_8: Bāladārako pana mandati yuttāyuttamajānanto uttānaseyyaṁparivattanaseyyaṁ vā supatīti mando.
anya-e0804n0:798_0: Idaṁ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṁ hohi nāyakā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:799_5: atha vā mandati appabhāvena gacchati pavattatīti nipphannapāṭipadikavasenapi gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:801_0: Hadakarīsossagge. Karīsossaggo nāma karīsassa ossajjanaṁ vissajjanaṁ. Hadati. Uhadati. Hadano.
anya-e0804n0:802_0: Ettha ca ‘‘yesaṁ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipī’’ti ayaṁ pāḷi nidassanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:802_5: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne ‘‘mutteti ohadeti cā’’ti cariyāpiṭakapāḷippadeso nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:803_0: Uda mode kīḷāyañca. Udati. Udānaṁ. Udaggo.
anya-e0804n0:804_4: Yathā hi yaṁ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṁgahetuṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0804n0:804_7: Yañca jalaṁ taḷākaṁ gahetuṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0804n0:804_10: evameva yaṁ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṁ vitakkavipphāraṁ hadayaṁ sandhāretuṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0804n0:804_11: so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā vacīdvārena nikkhamanto paṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāraviseso ‘‘udāna’’nti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:805_0: Kuda khuda guda kīḷāyameva. Kodati. Khodati. Godati.
anya-e0804n0:806_0: Sūda paggharaṇe. Sūdati. Suttaṁ. Sūdo. Rañño sūdā mahānase.
anya-e0804n0:807_0: Ettha ca suttanti sūdati dhenu viya khīraṁ atthe paggharāpetīti suttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:807_2: Sakammikadhātuttā pana ‘‘paggharāpetī’’ti kāritavasena attho kathetuṁ labbhati.
anya-e0804n0:807_3: Tathā hi ‘‘karotī’’ti padassa ‘‘nipphādetī’’ti attho kathetuṁ labbhati.
anya-e0804n0:807_7: Sūdati ‘‘evañcevañca kate khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sugandhaṁ manāpaṁ surasañca bhavissatī’’ti randhanakriyāya
anya-e0804n0:811_1: Sneho nāma vasāsaṅkhāto sneho pītisnehoti duvidho.
anya-e0804n0:812_0: Ettha ca medatīti medasahito bhavati ayaṁ purisoti attho.
anya-e0804n0:812_1: Medo nāma thūlassa sakalasarīraṁ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṁsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho,
anya-e0804n0:812_4: Tathā hi ‘‘te imaṁ kāyaṁ balaṁ gāhenti nāma brūhenti nāma medenti nāmā’’ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:812_6: Imissā pana dhātuyā divādigaṇaṁ pattāya pītisinehatthe ‘‘mejjatī’’ti suddhakatturūpaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:812_7: Curādigaṇaṁ pana pattāya ‘‘medeti medayatī’’ti suddhakatturūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:814_0: Sanda pasavane. Pasavanaṁ sandanaṁ avicchedappavatti. Sandati udakaṁ. Mahanto puññābhisando.
anya-e0804n0:815_0: Ettha ca puññābhisandoti puññappavāho, puññanadītipi vattuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0804n0:816_0: Madda maddane. Maddabhi, pamaddati. Mārasenappamaddano. Kaṇṭakaṁ maddati.
anya-e0804n0:821_11: Nisīdanaṁ, nisinnaṁ. Nisajjā. Gonisādo, upanisā. Sīdeti. Sīdayati. Sīdāpeti.
anya-e0804n0:822_0: Tattha kusītoti vīriyenādhigantabbassa atthassa alābhato kucchitenākārena sīdatīti kusīto.
anya-e0804n0:822_1: Atha vā sayampi kucchitenākārena sīdati aññepi sīdāpeti taṁ nissāya aññesaṁ sīdanassa sambhavatoti kusīto.
anya-e0804n0:825_0: Kusītoti cettha dassa tattaṁ ‘‘sugato’’ti ettha viya ‘‘satasmīti hotī’’ti ettha viya ca.
anya-e0804n0:825_12: Ettha pana ‘‘gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
anya-e0804n0:825_13: Mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho maññe tayā nisinnanti kukkuccaṁ upadahatītiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:825_22: Upanisāti upanisīdati phalaṁ etthāti upanisā, kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:826_0: Bhāve napuṁsako ñeyyo, nisinnanti ravo pana;
anya-e0804n0:830_0: Nida neda kucchāsannikarisesu. Kucchā garahā. Sannikarisaṁ vohāraviseso. Nidati. Nedati.
anya-e0804n0:831_0: Bundi nisāne. Nisānaṁ tejanaṁ tikkhatā. Bundati. Bondi.
anya-e0804n0:832_1: Tañhi bundāni tikkhāni pisuṇapharusavācādīni vā paññāvīriyādīni vā ettha santīti bondīti vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:833_0: ‘‘Nāhaṁ puna na ca puna, na cāpi apunappunaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:836_0: Kāyo dehaṁ sarīrañca, vapu bimbañca viggahaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:837_0: Bondi gattaṁ tanu ceva, attabhāvo tathūpadhi;
anya-e0804n0:839_0: Vada viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Vadati, vajjati. Vadeti, ovadati, ovadeti,
anya-e0804n0:839_7: Tattha ‘‘vajjantu bhonto amma’’nti pāḷidassanato vajjatīti padaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:839_12: ovadeti mahāmunī’’ti ca dassanato vadeti ovadetīti ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:840_0: Ovādeti , vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayati. Vajjento, vajjayanto, imāni hetukattupadāni.
anya-e0804n0:841_6: ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṁ’’ iccādīni bhavanti. ‘‘Vādo, ovādo, paṭivādo, pavādo,
anya-e0804n0:842_0: ‘‘Vadituṁ, vaditvā, vivaditvā’’ iccevamādīni ca tumantādīni padāni.
anya-e0804n0:843_1: Vaditabbaṁ vattabbanti vajjaṁ, kiṁ taṁ? Vacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:843_3: samaṅginī sāmikena homīti ettha hi vacanaṁ ‘‘vajja’’nti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:844_0: Vadanaṁ lapanaṁ tuṇḍaṁ, mukha massañca ānanaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:847_0: Tatrāyaṁ padamālā, vadati, vadanti. Vadasi, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadate, vadante. Vadase, vadavhe. Vade, vadamhe.
anya-e0804n0:848_0: Vadatu, vadantu. Vadāhi, vada, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadataṁ, vadantaṁ. Vadassu, vadavho. Vade, vadāmase.
anya-e0804n0:849_0: Vajjati, vajjanti. Vajjasi, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjate, vajjante. Vajjase, vajjavhe. Vajje, vajjamhe.
anya-e0804n0:850_0: Vajjatu , vajjantu. Vajjāhi, vajja, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjataṁ,
anya-e0804n0:850_3: Imā dve padamālā vadadhātussa vajjādesavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:850_7: Ettha vajjantīti idaṁ suddhakattupadaṁ taddīpakattā. Kiṁ viya?
anya-e0804n0:852_0: Nadantu bheī sannaddhā, vaggū vadantu dundubhī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:853_1: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘vajjantīti vajjiṁsūti atītavacane vattamānavacanaṁ veditabba’’nti suddhakattuvasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n0:853_2: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu vadadhātussa vajjādeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:854_0: ‘‘Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū;
anya-e0804n0:856_1: Tañca kho vaṇṇasandhivisayattā vādayantīti kāritapadarūpena siddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:856_2: Tathā hi ‘‘vādayantī’’ti padarūpaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā yakāre pare saralopo kato,
anya-e0804n0:856_5: Tathā hi ‘‘devatā nabhe accherakaṁ bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ disvā antalikkhe etāni saṅkhapaṇavādīni
anya-e0804n0:856_6: tūriyāni vādayantī’’ti hetukattuvasena attho gahetabbo bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:856_7: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu vadassa vajjādeso na bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:857_4: ‘‘idameva sacca’nti vivādayantī’’ti ca ‘‘evampi viggayha vivādayantī’’ti ca evamādīsu vadantipadena samānatthaṁ
anya-e0804n0:857_7: Na hi saṅkhapaṇavādīnaṁ pāṭihāriyādidassanaṁ upapajjati dassanacittassa abhāvatoti. Saccaṁ, tathāpi –
anya-e0804n0:860_1: Tasmā ‘‘vajjantīti vādayantī’’ti vivaraṇaṁ suddhakattuvasena katanti? Tanna, heṭṭhā –
anya-e0804n0:863_0: Iminnā gāthāya ‘‘vādentīti vādayanti devatā’’ti sapāṭhasesassa atthavivaraṇassa hetukattuvasena katattā.
anya-e0804n0:863_2: athopi diṇḍimā bahū’ti paccattavacanavasena vuttattā vajjantīti padaṁ kammavācakapada’’nti ce? Tampi na,
anya-e0804n0:864_1: Dvigaṇiko vadadhātu bhūvādigaṇiko ca curādigaṇiko ca.
anya-e0804n0:864_2: So hi bhūvādigaṇe vattanto ‘‘vadati vajjatī’’ti suddhakatturūpāni janetvā ‘‘vādeti, vādayati, vādāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:864_11: vajjeyyuṁ’’ iccādi ca sabbaṁ neyyaṁ vajjādesavasena.
anya-e0804n0:865_1: Pitā mātā ca te dajjunti padamiva.
anya-e0804n0:865_2: Ettha ca ‘‘vajjuṁ vā te na vā vajjuṁ,
anya-e0804n0:865_15: Pubbe viya idhāpi yakāre pare saralopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:866_4: Tathā hi ‘‘yo ātumānaṁ sayameva pāva’’ iti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:866_5: Ettha pasaddo upasaggo dīghaṁ katvā vutto ‘‘pāvadati pāvacana’’ntiādīsu viya,
anya-e0804n0:866_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana atītavacanaṁ idanti jānantopi garu vattamānavacanavasena ‘‘pāvāti vadatī’’ti vivaraṇamakāsi
anya-e0804n0:867_0: Āyasmāpi ca sāriputto niddese ‘‘yo ātumānaṁ sayameva pāvā’’ti padaṁ nikkhipitvā ātumā vuccati attā,
anya-e0804n0:867_2: ‘‘ahamasmi sīlasampanno’’ti vā ‘‘vatasampanno’’ti vāti vattamānavacanena atthaṁ niddisi.
anya-e0804n0:867_3: Atha vā pāvāti idaṁ na kevalaṁ vadadhātuvaseneva nipphannaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:867_5: Tathā hi idaṁ papubbassa usadde iti dhātussa payoge ukārassa okārādesaṁ katvā tato parokkhābhūte akāre
anya-e0804n0:867_6: pare okārassa āvādesaṁ tato ca sandhikiccaṁ katvā sijjhati,
anya-e0804n0:867_7: tasmā udhātussa vadadhātuyā samānatthattā tannipphannarūpassa ca vadadhātuyā nipphannarūpena samānarūpattā
anya-e0804n0:868_0: Idāni vicchinnā padamālā ghaṭīyati. Vada, vaduṁ. Vade, vadittha, vadaṁ, vadimha. Vadittha, vadire. Vadittho, vadivho. Vadiṁ, vadimhe. Pāvada,
anya-e0804n0:870_0: ‘‘Avadi, vadi, avaduṁ, vaduṁ, avadiṁsu, vadiṁsu. Avajji, vajji’’ iccādīni ajjatanīrūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:872_4: Yā panettha vadadhātu viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ vuttā,
anya-e0804n0:873_7: Vedoti vidati sukhumampi kāraṇaṁ ājānātīti vedo,
anya-e0804n0:873_10: Vedoti vā vedaganthassapi nāmaṁ vidanti jānanti etena uccāritamattena tadādhāraṁ puggalaṁ ‘‘brāhmaṇo aya’’nti,
anya-e0804n0:873_11: vidanti vā etena brāhmaṇā attanā kattabbakiccanti vedo.
anya-e0804n0:873_13: Āthabbaṇavedaṁ pana paṇītajjhāsayā na sikkhanti parūpaghātasahitattā.
anya-e0804n0:878_1: So hi yathāsabhāvato kammañca phalañca kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidatīti ‘‘vidū’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:879_2: rudati iccapi. Ruṇṇaṁ. Ruditaṁ. Rodanaṁ. Rodanto. Rodamāno. Rodantī. Rodamānā.
anya-e0804n0:880_1: Mataṁ puttaṁ vā bhātaraṁ vā rodati.
anya-e0804n0:880_6: ahaṁ etaṁ bhagavato byākaraṇaṁ na parodāmi na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti evaṁ sakammikavasenattho veditabbo,
anya-e0804n0:881_0: ‘Mataṁ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṁ na dissati;
anya-e0804n0:882_0: Jīvantaṁ amma passanti, kasmā maṁ amma rodasī’ti
anya-e0804n0:883_2: ‘‘yathā sakammakā dhātusaddā atthavisesavasena akammakā honti ‘vibuddho puriso vibuddho kamalasaṇḍo’ti,
anya-e0804n0:883_3: evaṁ atthavisesavasena akammakāpi sakammakā hontīti dassetuṁ ‘na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti āha.
anya-e0804n0:883_5: Ayañcettha payogoti iminā gāthāya anutthunanaṁ rudanaṁ adhippetanti dassetī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:884_1: Dukkhassa gati patiṭṭhāti duggatīti ayaṁ attho ‘‘apāyaṁ duggatiṁvinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjatī’’tiādīsu yujjati,
anya-e0804n0:884_2: idha pana idaṁ atthaṁ aggahetvā añño attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:884_4: Dukkhena kicchena gati gamanaṁ annapānādilābho duggatīti.
anya-e0804n0:884_7: Tattha daliddatīti sabbaṁ icchiticchitaṁ paraṁ yācitvā eva dukkhena adhigacchati,
anya-e0804n0:884_12: Ettha ca sabbameva ‘‘daliddatī’’ti lokikappayogadassanato ‘‘daliddatī’’ti kriyāpadaṁ vibhāvitaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:884_13: Sāsane pana taṁ kriyāpadaṁ na āgataṁ,
anya-e0804n0:884_16: Garū pana kaccāyanamatavasena dala duggatimhīti duggativācakadaladhātuto iddapaccayaṁ katvā ‘‘daliddo’’ti nāmapadaṁ dassesuṁ.
anya-e0804n0:885_0: Tuda byathane. Tudati, vitudati. Kammani ‘‘tujjati, vitujjamāno, vedanābhibhunno’’ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:890_0: Nuda peraṇe. Peraṇaṁ cuṇṇikaraṇaṁ pisanaṁ, nudati, panudati. Panudanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:891_0: Vidi lābhe. Vindati. Uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṁ. Govindo.
anya-e0804n0:892_0: Khadi parighāte. Parighātaṁ samantato hananaṁ. Khandati.
anya-e0804n0:895_12: Sakyā kho ambaṭṭha rājānaṁ ukkākaṁ pitāmahaṁ dahanti.
anya-e0804n0:896_0: Vipubbo dhā karotyatthe, abhipubbo tu bhāsane;
anya-e0804n0:898_0: Imasmā pana dhādhātuto pubbassa api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṁ lopaṁ pappoti,
anya-e0804n0:898_10: Ettha hi akāro apiupasaggassa avayavo na hoti. Kinti ce?
anya-e0804n0:898_14: Evaṁ dhādhātuto pubbassa api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṁ lopaṁ pappoti,
anya-e0804n0:898_17: Yatra hi nāma bhagavato pāvacane evarūpapopi nayo sandissati viññūnaṁ hadayavimhāpanakaro,
anya-e0804n0:898_18: yo ekasmiṁyeva dhātumhi ekasmiṁyeva upasagge ekasmiṁyevatthe kvaci lopālopavasena vibhajituṁ labbhati.
anya-e0804n0:898_19: Idāni mayaṁ sotūnaṁ paramakosallajananatthaṁ tadubhayampi ākāraṁ ekajjhaṁ karontā tadākāravatiṁ jinavarapāḷiṁ ānayāma –
anya-e0804n0:899_0: ‘‘Gaṅgaṁ me pidahissanti, na taṁ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
anya-e0804n0:900_0: Apidhetuṁ mahāsindhuṁ, taṁ kathaṁ so bhavissati;
anya-e0804n0:901_0: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṁ, atthaṁ dhammañca pucchito.
anya-e0804n0:904_0: Dhu gatitheriyesu. Gati gamanaṁ, theriyaṁ thirabhāvo. Dhavati. Dhuvaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:905_3: Atha vā dhuvanti idaṁ gatitheriyatthavasena nibbānasseva adhivacanaṁ bhavitumarahati.
anya-e0804n0:905_4: Tañhi jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokādito muccitukāmehi dhavitabbaṁ gantabbanti dhuvaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:905_5: uppādavayābhāvena vā niccasabhāvattā dhavati thiraṁ sassataṁ bhavatīti dhuvaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:905_6: Yañhi sandhāya bhagavatā ‘‘dhuvañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi dhuvagāminiñca paṭipada’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:905_9: ‘‘Dhuvaṁ buddho bhavissasī’’ti ettha pana ekaṁse nipātapadabhāvena vattatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:908_0: Ettha ca dhenūti dhayati pivati ito khīraṁ potakoti dhenu,
anya-e0804n0:908_3: migadhenū’’ti dhenusaddo sāmaññavasena sapotikāsu tiracchānagatitthīsu vattati,
anya-e0804n0:908_5: Tathā hi ‘‘satta dhenusate datvā’’ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:909_9: Idha acinteyyabalattā upasaggānaṁ taṁyoge sidhudhātussa nānappakārā atthā sambhavanti,
anya-e0804n0:910_2: maṅgalyaṁ pāpavināsanaṁ vuddhikāraṇaṁ vā. Sedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, pasiddhi.
anya-e0804n0:911_3: Ayaṁ itthī imaṁ itthiṁ ayyikaṁ dahati.
anya-e0804n0:911_4: Ime purisā imaṁ purisaṁ pitāmahaṁ dahanti.
anya-e0804n0:912_0: Edha vuddhiyaṁ lābhe ca. Edhati. Edho, sukhedhito. Gambhīre gādhamedhati.
anya-e0804n0:913_1: Vaḍḍhati etena pāvakoti edho. Indanaṁ, upādānaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:914_0: Baddha saṁharise. Saṁhariso vinibaddhakriyā. Baddhati, vinibaddhati. Vinibaddhā.
anya-e0804n0:915_0: Gādha patiṭṭhānissayagandhesu. Gādhati. Gādhaṁ kattā. Gambhīrato agādhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:916_0: Bādha viloḷane bādhati, vibādhati. Ābādho. Ābādhati cittaṁ viloḷetīti ābādho.
anya-e0804n0:919_0: Tattha bandhananti bandhanti satte etenāti bandhanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:921_0: Vaddha vaddhane. Vaddhati. Vaddhi, vuddhi, vaddho, vuddho, jātivuddho, guṇavuddho, vayovuddho.
anya-e0804n0:923_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṁsā, samparāye ca suggatiṁ.
anya-e0804n0:928_0: Medha hiṁsāyaṁ saṅgame ca. Medhati. Medhā, medhāvī.
anya-e0804n0:928_1: Atra medhāti asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṁsatīti medhā.
anya-e0804n0:928_2: Medhati vā siriyā sīlādīhi ca sappurisadhammehi saha gacchati na ekikā hutvā tiṭṭhatīti medhā,
anya-e0804n0:933_0: Vuttaṁ. Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya ca samannāgato puggalo.
anya-e0804n0:934_0: Sadhu madhu unde. Sadhati. Madhati. Madhu.
anya-e0804n0:937_0: Dīdhi dittivedhanesu. Dīdhati. Dīdhiti. Ettha ca dīdhitīti rasmi. Anekāni hi rasmināmāni.
anya-e0804n0:938_0: Rasmi ābhā pabhā raṁsi, ditti bhā ruci dīdhiti;
anya-e0804n0:939_0: Marīci juti bhāṇva’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo;
anya-e0804n0:943_1: Vineyya hadaye daraṁ. Āneti. Ānayati. Netā. Vinetā. Nāyako. Neyyo . Veneyyo. Venayiko.
anya-e0804n0:943_4: kinnu tāta udikkhati. Nīyanto. Nettaṁ. Netti.
