anya-e0804n0:943_7: Nette ujuṁ gate sati. Nayo. Vinayo. Āyatanaṁ. Netuṁ. Vinetuṁ. Netvā.
anya-e0804n0:944_0: Tattha nettanti samavisamaṁ dassentaṁ attabhāvaṁ netīti nettaṁ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n0:944_1: Nettīti nenti etāya satteti netti, rajju.
anya-e0804n0:944_4: Tāya hi sattā goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṁ taṁ bhavaṁ niyyanti,
anya-e0804n0:944_9: Atha vā tattha tattha netabboti nayo,
anya-e0804n0:945_0: Tathā hi chabbidho nayo tathattanayo pattinayo desanānayo antadvayavivajjananayo acinteyyanayo adhippāyanayoti.
anya-e0804n0:945_4: Etthādimhi tividho nayo kammasādhanena nīyatīti ‘‘nayo’’ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:945_5: pacchimo pana tividho nayo karaṇasādhanena nīyati etena tathattādinayattayamiti ‘‘nayo’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:945_6: Imasmiṁ atthe papañciyamāne ganthavitthāro siyāti vitthāro na dassito.
anya-e0804n0:946_0: Aparopi catubbidho nayo ekattanayo nānattanayo abyāpāranayo evaṁdhammatānayoti.
anya-e0804n0:947_3: Āyatananti anamatagge saṁsāre pavattaṁ atīva āyataṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ yāva na nivattati,
anya-e0804n0:948_2: gunnaṁ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana’’nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṁ āyaanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n0:949_3: Aññepi pana payogā yata patiyataneti ettha pakāsitā.
anya-e0804n0:952_0: Thana pana dhana sadde. Thanati. Panati. Dhanati.
anya-e0804n0:954_0: Ettha ca yobbanibhāve ṭhitattā rūpavilāsena kanati dippati virocatīti kaññā.
anya-e0804n0:954_1: Atha vā kaniyati kāmiyabhi abhipatthiyati purisehītipi kaññā,
anya-e0804n0:955_0: Suvaṇṇaṁ kanakaṁ hemaṁ, kañcanaṁ haṭakampi ca;
anya-e0804n0:959_1: Taṁ sambhajanti mayūrakokilādayo sattāti vanaṁ, araññaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:963_0: Ettha ca ‘‘kasmā te eko bhujo janati,
anya-e0804n0:963_1: eko te na janatī bhujo’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:964_0: Khanu avadāraṇe khanati. Sukhaṁ. Dukkhaṁ. Khato āvāṭo.
anya-e0804n0:965_0: Tattha sukhanti suṭṭhu dukkhaṁ khanatīti sukhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:965_7: dukkaraṁ khamassāti dukkha’’nti nibbacanānipi vividhā hi saddānaṁ byuppatti pavatti nimittañca.
anya-e0804n0:968_1: Ettha pana hiṁsāvacanena pharusāya vācāya pīḷanañca daṇḍādīhi paharaṇañca gahitaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:968_3: Tathā hi ‘‘rājāno coraṁ gahetvā haneyyuṁ vā bandheyyuṁ vā’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:968_4: Pāṭhassa atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇentehi ‘‘haneyyunti potheyyuñceva chindeyyuñcā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:968_5: Ettha ca chedanaṁ nāma hatthapādādichedanaṁ vā sīsacchedavasena māraṇaṁ vā.
anya-e0804n0:969_1: ‘‘Hanti hatthehi pādehī’’ti ettha pana hantīti paharatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:969_10: Attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī’’tiādīsu vadho paharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:969_14: Satte ghātetī’’ti ca ādīsu vadho māraṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:970_10: iccādīni kammapadāni. Hantā. Hato. Vadhako. Vadhū. Āghāto. Upaghāto. Ghātako. Paṭigho. Saṅgho. Byaggho.
anya-e0804n0:971_0: Tattha upāhananti taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ upahananti upagacchanti tato ca āhananti āgacchanti etenāti upāhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:971_4: Tathā hi ‘‘tena hi vadhu yadā utunī ahosi,
anya-e0804n0:971_6: atha me āroceyyāsī’’ti ettha vadhūti suṇisā vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:971_7: Sā pana ‘‘ayaṁ no puttassa bhariyā’’ti sassusasurehi adhigantabbā jānitabbāti vadhūti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:971_8: Gatyatthānaṁ katthaci buddhiyatthakathanato ayamattho labbhateva. ‘‘Suṇhā, suṇisā,
anya-e0804n0:971_12: suṭṭhu vā kilese hanti tena tena maggāsinā māretītipi saṅgho,
anya-e0804n0:971_14: Vividhe satte āhanati bhuso ghātetīti byaggho.
anya-e0804n0:971_19: ayaṁ pana hanadhātu divādigaṇe ‘‘paṭihaññatī’’ti akammakaṁ kattupadaṁ janeti.
anya-e0804n0:971_20: Tathā hi ‘‘buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatī’’tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:972_7: Tattha yasmā sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānaṁ mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle paṭhamaṁ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati,
anya-e0804n0:972_8: pacchā bāhiravāto sukhumaṁ rajaṁ gahetvā abbhantaraṁ pavisanto tāluṁ āhacca nibbāyati,
anya-e0804n0:972_11: Etesu dvīsu nayesu vinayanayena anto uṭṭhitasasanaṁ assāso,
anya-e0804n0:972_13: Suttantanayena pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso.
anya-e0804n0:972_15: Ayameva ca nayo ‘‘assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṁ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṁ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi
anya-e0804n0:972_16: cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā’’ti,
anya-e0804n0:972_17: ‘‘passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṁ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā
anya-e0804n0:972_18: ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā’’ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:973_3: Dhātuattho hi yebhuyyena bhāvavasena kathiyati ṭhapetvā vakkarukkhataceti evamādippabhedaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:973_4: Yathā bhāvatthe vattamānena yapaccayena saddhiṁ nakārassa yyakāraṁ katvā thenanaṁ theyyanti vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:973_5: evamidha yapaccayena saddhiṁ nakārassa ññakāraṁ katvā dhananaṁ dhaññanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:973_7: tasmiṁ dhaññe. Dhanti, dhanati. Dhanitaṁ. Dhaññaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:973_9: tasmā ‘‘dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṁ puttaṁ vijāyī’’tiādīsu dhaññasaddena siripaññāva gahetabbā puññassa visuṁ vacanato.
anya-e0804n0:975_0: Ye te dakkhanti vadanaṁ, dhaññā te narapuṅgava.
anya-e0804n0:977_0: Ye pāde paṇamissanti, tepi dhaññā guṇandhara.
anya-e0804n0:980_2: Idamettha nibbacanaṁ ‘‘dhaññaṁ siripuññapaññāsampadā etesaṁ atthīti dhaññā’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:980_3: ‘‘Dhaññaṁ maṅgalasammata’’nti ettha tu ‘‘uttamaratanaṁ ida’’nti dhanāyitabbaṁ saddhāyitabbanti dhaññaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:980_5: ‘‘Dhaññaṁ dhanaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpa’’nti ca ādīsu ‘‘natthi dhaññasamaṁ dhana’’nti vacanato dhanāyitabbanti dhaññaṁ, kiṁ taṁ?
anya-e0804n0:980_9: niddhano’’ti ca natthi dhanaṁ etassāti atthena daliddapuggalo vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:980_10: ‘‘Nidhanaṁ yātī’’tiettha tu kampanatthavācakassa dhūdhātussa vasena vināso nidhananti vuccatīti.
anya-e0804n0:982_5: ‘‘Sabbo taṁ jano ocināyatū’’ti idamettha pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:987_0: Pā pāne. Pānaṁ pivanaṁ. ‘‘Pāti, pānti. Pātu, pāntu’’ iccādi yathārahaṁ yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:988_0: Khippaṁ gīvaṁ pasārehi, na te dassāmi jīvitaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:989_0: Ayañhite mayā rūḷho, saro pāssati lohitanti.
anya-e0804n0:990_3: apassaṁsu’’ iccādinā ca nayena sesaṁ sabbaṁ yojetabbaṁ nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n0:990_4: Ko hi samattho sabbāni buddhavacanasāgare vicitrāni vippakiṇṇarūpantararatanāni uddharitvā dassetuṁ,
anya-e0804n0:990_5: tasmā sabbāsupi dhātūsu saṅkhepena gahaṇūpāyamattameva dassitaṁ. Pivati, pivanti. Pivaṁ, pivanto, pivamāno,
anya-e0804n0:990_13: Aññesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena saddarūpāni evameva yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:991_0: Pā rakkhaṇe. Pāti. Nipāti. Pitā, gopo.
anya-e0804n0:993_1: So hi vippeti pūreti visiṭṭhena veduccāraṇādinā attano brāhmaṇakammena lokassa ajjhāsayaṁ attano ca hadaye vedānīti vippoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:993_2: ‘‘Jāto vippakule aha’’nti ettha hi brāhmaṇo ‘‘vippo’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:994_1: Ettha puttoti attano kulaṁ pavati sodhetīti putto.
anya-e0804n0:1005_2: Evaṁ atrajāti itthivācakassa itthiliṅgassa dassanato sutasaddādīsupi itthiliṅganayo labbhamānālabbhamānavasena upaparikkhitabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1005_6: ‘‘Puriso pumā’’ iccādīnaṁ pana yugaḷabhāvena itthivācakāni itthiliṅgāni na dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:1005_7: Puññanti ettha pana attano kārakaṁ pavati sodhetīti puññaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1005_8: Kiyādigaṇaṁ pana patvā punātīti puññanti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1011_0: Pe gatiyaṁ. Peti, penti. Pesi, petha.
anya-e0804n0:1011_1: Idha bhikkhave ekacco assakhaḷuṅko pehīti vutto viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭisakkati,
anya-e0804n0:1012_1: Ettha apāyoti natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti apāyo.
anya-e0804n0:1013_3: tato vā attānaṁ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako,
anya-e0804n0:1016_0: Evaṁ gopetha attānaṁ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā.
anya-e0804n0:1024_0: Kapu sāmatthiye. Idaṁ amhākaṁ kappati. Netaṁ amhesu kappati.
anya-e0804n0:1025_0: Kapa karuṇāyaṁ. Kapati. Kapaṇo, kāpaññaṁ. Tattha kapatīti karuṇāyati, kāpaññanti kapaṇabhāvo.
anya-e0804n0:1026_0: Sapaakkose. Sapati. Sapatho, abhisapatho, abhisapito, sapanako.
anya-e0804n0:1028_0: Supa sayane. Supati. Sukhaṁ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhare. Sutto puriso, supanaṁ, suttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1029_0: Khipa peraṇe. Peraṇaṁ cuṇṇikaraṇaṁ pisanaṁ. Khepati. Khepako.
anya-e0804n0:1030_0: Khipa abyattasadde. Khipati. Khipitasaddo. Yadā ca dhammaṁ desento, khipi lokagganāyako.
anya-e0804n0:1032_0: Opa niṭṭhubhane. Niṭṭhubhanaṁ kheḷapātanaṁ. Opati. Osadhaṁ saṅkharitvā mukhe kheḷaṁ opi.
anya-e0804n0:1033_0: Lipi upalepe. Lepati. Littaṁ paramena tejasā.
anya-e0804n0:1036_1: Nidampanaṁ nāma sassarukkhādīsu vīhisīsaṁ vā varakasīsaṁ vā acchinditvā khuddakasākhaṁ vā abhañjitvā
anya-e0804n0:1036_2: yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva vā paṇṇamattasseva vā gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1038_0: Tapa ubbege. Ubbego utrāso bhīrutā. Tapati, uttapati. Ottappaṁ, ottappiyaṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1039_5: Bhāve tāpanaṁ, tāpo, paritāpo, santāpo. Dhūpanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1042_1: Akammako cāyaṁ sakammako ca. Pupphati. Pupphaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1042_8: Mañjūsako nāma rukkho yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni,
anya-e0804n0:1044_0: Dapha daphi vappha gatiyaṁ. Daphati. Damphati. Vapphati.
anya-e0804n0:1052_0: Pabba vabba mabba kabba khabba gabba sabba cabba gatiyaṁ. Pabbati. Vabbati. Mabbati. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati. Sabbati. Cabbati.
anya-e0804n0:1053_0: Abba sabba hiṁsāyañca. Gatyāpekkhāya cakāro. Abbati. Sabbati.
anya-e0804n0:1055_0: Lubi tubi addane. Lumbati. Tumbati. Lumbinīvanaṁ. Udakatumbo. Athopi dve ca tumbāni.
anya-e0804n0:1056_4: kathaṁ ambudharabinducumbitakūṭoti ettha avadane aviññāṇake pabbatakūṭe ambudharabindūnaṁ cumbanaṁ vutta’’nti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1056_5: taṁ pana cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhavaṁ cetasi ṭhapetvā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1056_6: yathā adassanasambhavepi dassanasadisenākārena sambhūtattā ‘‘rodante dārake disvā,
anya-e0804n0:1056_7: ubbiddhā vipulā dumā’’ti acakkhukānampi rukkhānaṁ dassanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1056_8: evamidhāpi cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhūtattā avadanānampi ambudharabindūnaṁ cumbanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1056_9: Sabhāvato pana aviññāṇakānaṁ dassanacumbanādīni ca natthi,
anya-e0804n0:1057_0: Ubbi tubbi thubbi dubbi dhubbi hiṁsatthā. Ubbati. Tubbati. Thubbati. Dubbati. Dubbā. Dhubbati.
anya-e0804n0:1060_0: Pubba pabba sabba pūraṇe. Pubbati. Pabbati. Sabbati.
anya-e0804n0:1060_3: sabbanāmesu ca tumantādivirahitesu ca nipātesu upasaggesu ca dhātucintā nāma natthi,
anya-e0804n0:1060_6: tena te tabbhāvamuttattā dhātucintāyaṁ pubbācariyehi gahitā ‘‘pubbati sabbatī’’ti payogadassanatoti.
anya-e0804n0:1060_7: Yadi evaṁ kasmā buddhavacane etāni rūpāni na santīti?
anya-e0804n0:1060_10: Kiñcāpi buddhavacanesu etāni rūpāni na santi,
anya-e0804n0:1060_12: yathā ‘‘nāthatīti nātho’’ti ettha ‘‘nāthatī’’ti rūpaṁ buddhavacane avijjamānampi gahetabbaṁ hoti,
anya-e0804n0:1060_14: Tasmā vohāresu viññūnaṁ kosallatthāya sāsane avijjamānāpi sāsanānurūpā lokikappayogā gahetabbāti ‘‘pubbati sabbatī’’ti rūpāni gahitāni.
anya-e0804n0:1062_0: Kabba khabba gabba dabbe. Dabbo ahaṅkāro. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati.
anya-e0804n0:1063_0: Abi dabi sadde. Ambati. Ambā, ambu. Dambati.
anya-e0804n0:1067_0: Bhā dittiyaṁ. Cando bhāti, pañhā maṁ paṭibhāti. Ratti vibhāti. Bhāṇu, paṭibhānaṁ. Vibhātā ratti.
anya-e0804n0:1070_0: Sumbha bhāsane ca. Cakāro hiṁsāpekkhako. Sumbhati. Sumbho. Kusumbho.
anya-e0804n0:1072_0: Abbha vabbha mabbha gatiyaṁ. Abbhati. Abbho. Vabbhati. Mabbhati.
anya-e0804n0:1073_1: So hi abbhati anekasatapaṭalo hutvā gacchatīti ‘‘abbho’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1073_6: sa gacchaṁ na nivattatī’’ti ettha pulliṅgo. ‘‘Abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo,
anya-e0804n0:1075_0: Megho valāhako laṅghi, jīmūto ambudo ghano;
anya-e0804n0:1078_2: Tathā hi ‘‘methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo’’ti ca ‘‘na me rājā sakhā hoti,
anya-e0804n0:1078_3: na rājā hoti methuno’’ti ca sobhane vācāvisaye ayaṁ bhāsā āgatā.
anya-e0804n0:1078_5: Na hi hirottappasampanno lokiyajanopi īdisiṁ vācaṁ bhāsati.
anya-e0804n0:1078_6: Evaṁ santepi adhimattukkaṁsagatahirottappopi bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditahadayo lokānukampāya parisamajjhe abhāsi.
anya-e0804n0:1081_0: Byathayo gāmadhammo ca, yābhassaṁ mohanaṁ rati.
anya-e0804n0:1085_0: Debhaabhi dabhi sadde. Debhati. Ambhati. Ambho. Dambhati.
anya-e0804n0:1086_1: Tañhi nijjīvampi samānaṁ oghakālādīsu vissandamānaṁ ambhati saddaṁ karotīti ambhoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1088_0: Pānīyaṁ udakaṁ toyaṁ, jalaṁ pāto ca ambu ca;
anya-e0804n0:1089_0: Dakaṁ kaṁ salilaṁ vāri, āpo ambho papampi ca.
anya-e0804n0:1090_0: Nīrañca kepukaṁ pāni, amataṁ elameva ca,
anya-e0804n0:1092_0: Ettha ca ‘‘vālaggesu ca kepuke. Pivitañca tesaṁ bhusaṁ hoti pānī’’tiādayo payogā dassetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:1098_2: gabbhe vasati māṇavo’’ti ettha mātukucchi ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1098_4: Gabbho ca patito chamā’’ti ca ettha pana kucchigataputto.
anya-e0804n0:1099_3: Taṁsamaṅgino pana pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘caṇḍā ruddhā rabhasā’’ti evaṁ āgatā.
anya-e0804n0:1101_1: Ārambhasaddo kamme āpattiyaṁ kriyāya vīriye hiṁsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
anya-e0804n0:1104_1: ‘‘Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī’’ti ettha āpatti.
anya-e0804n0:1104_3: na te honti mahapphallā’’ti ettha yūpussāpanādikriyā.
anya-e0804n0:1104_6: ‘‘Samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ uddissa pāṇaṁ ārambhantī’’ti ettha hiṁsā.
anya-e0804n0:1104_7: ‘‘Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī’’ti ettha chedanabhañjanādikaṁ vikopanaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n0:1107_0: Labha lābhe. Labhati, labbhati. Lābho, laddhaṁ, alattha, alatthuṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1108_0: Subha dittiyaṁ. Sobhati. Sobhā, sobhanaṁ, sobhito.
anya-e0804n0:1112_6: Divādigaṇaṁ pana patvā giddhiyatthe ‘‘lubbhatī’’ti rūpaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:1114_0: Rubhi nivāraṇe. Rumbhati, sannirumbhati. Sannirumbho, sannirumbhitvā.
anya-e0804n0:1115_0: Ubha ubbha umbha pūraṇe. Ubhati. Ubbhati. Umbhati. Ubhanā. Ubbhanā. Umbhanā. Obho. Keṭubhaṁ. Ubbhaṁ. Kumbho. Kumbhī.
anya-e0804n0:1116_1: Idaṁ panettha nibbacanaṁ kiṭeti gameti kriyādivibhāgaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1116_2: taṁ vā anavasesapariyādānato keṭento gamento obheti pūretīti keṭutaṁ kiṭaubhadhātuvasena.
anya-e0804n0:1116_9: Tattha ca accubbhanti ativiya yācakānaṁ ajjhāsayaṁ pūraṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1121_0: Mā māne sadde ca. Māti. Mātā. Ettha mātāti janikā vā cūḷamātā vā mahāmātā vā.
anya-e0804n0:1122_0: Mū bandhane. Mavati. Kiyādigaṇassa panassa ‘‘munātī’’ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1124_1: Sā hi sukhumampi atthaṁ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti cāti medhāti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1124_3: Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṁsatīti medhā,
anya-e0804n0:1124_5: Saṅgamatthavācakassa pana medhadhātussa vasena medhati sīlasamādhiādīhi saddhammehi siriyā ca saṅgacchatīti medhāti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1127_0: Omā sāmatthiye. Sāmatthiyaṁ samatthabhāvo. Aluttantoyaṁ dhātu, omāti, omanti.
anya-e0804n0:1128_0: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi ‘‘omāti bhante bhagavā iddhiyā manomayena kāyena brahmalokaṁ upasaṅkamitu’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:1129_0: Timu addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Temati. Tinto, temiyo. Temitukāmā temiṁsu.
anya-e0804n0:1130_0: Ettha temiyoti evaṁnāmako kāsirañño putto bodhisatto.
anya-e0804n0:1130_1: So hi rañño ceva mahājanassa ca hadayaṁ temento addabhāvaṁ pāpento sītalabhāvaṁ janento jātoti ‘‘temiyo’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:1131_0: Nitami kilamane. Nitammati. Hadayaṁ dayhate nitammāmi.
anya-e0804n0:1132_0: Camu chamu japu jhamu umu jimu adane. Camati. Camū.
anya-e0804n0:1132_1: Camūti senā. Chamati. Jamati. Jhamati. Umati. Jemati.
anya-e0804n0:1133_3: tasmā ‘‘nāssa kāye aggi vā visaṁ vā satthaṁ vā kamatī’’tiādīsu apadavikkhepatthopi gahetabbo. Kamati.
anya-e0804n0:1133_23: Yasmā panāyaṁ dhātu curādigaṇaṁ patvā icchākanti yatthesu vattati,
anya-e0804n0:1133_24: tasmā tepi atthe upasaggavisesite katvā idha abhikkantasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vattabbampi avatvā upari curādigaṇeyeva kathessāma.
anya-e0804n0:1135_0: Nama bahutte sadde. Bahutto saddo nāma uggatasaddo. Namati.
anya-e0804n0:1136_0: Ama dama hamma mima chama gatimhi. Amati. Damati. Hammati. Mimati. Chamati. Chamā.
anya-e0804n0:1137_2: ‘‘na chamāyaṁ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā’’ti ca ‘‘chamāyaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1137_4: So ca kho sattahi aṭṭhahi vā vibhattīhi dvīsu ca vacanesu yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1138_1: Dhamadhātu sadde ca mukhavātena saddhiṁ aggisaṁyoge ca vattati.
anya-e0804n0:1140_0: Namunamane. Namati. Namo. Nataṁ, namanaṁ. Nati. Namaṁ. Namamāno. Namanto. Namito. Nāmaṁ. Nāmitaṁ. Namituṁ. Natvā, natvāna. Namitvā,
anya-e0804n0:1140_4: Tatra hi ‘‘namati namitvā’’ti evaṁpakārāni padāni namanatthe vandanāyañca daṭṭhabbāni,
anya-e0804n0:1145_1: Tena hi paccattopayogavacanāni abhinnarūpāni dissanti ‘‘devarāja namo tyatthu.
anya-e0804n0:1146_0: Khamu sahane. Khamati. Khanti. Khamo, khamanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1152_0: Gamugatiyaṁ. Gacchati. Gamako. Gato. Gati. Gamanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1153_5: Ārato virato paṭivirato. Uparato, uparamo. Ārāmo.
anya-e0804n0:1155_0: Dhīratthu taṁ visaṁ vantaṁ, yamahaṁ jīvitakāraṇā;
anya-e0804n0:1156_0: Vantaṁ paccāvamissāmi, mataṁ me jīvitā varaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1157_4: So hi ahinakulaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko.
anya-e0804n0:1157_6: Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṁsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n0:1157_7: Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṁ deve vassantepi na vippakirayati,
anya-e0804n0:1157_8: nidāghepi tato paṁsumuṭṭhiṁ gahetvā tasmiṁ muṭṭhinā pīḷiyamāne sinehova nikkhamati,
anya-e0804n0:1158_1: himavā’’tiādīni padāni na kevalaṁ vantupaccayavaseneva nipphādetabbāni,
anya-e0804n0:1158_3: tenāha visuddhimaggakārako ‘‘yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṁ gamanamanena vantaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1158_6: vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṁ katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:1158_7: yathā loke ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti vattabbe mekhalā’’ti vadatā niruttinayena saddasiddhi dassitā.
anya-e0804n0:1159_2: yena ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti ettha mekārakhakāralākārānaṁ kamato gahaṇaṁ dissati,
anya-e0804n0:1159_3: ‘‘bhavesu vantagamano’ti ettha pana bhakāravakāragakārānaṁ kamato gahaṇaṁ na dissatī’’ti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:1159_5: vijjācaraṇasampanno’’tiādīsu viya guṇasaddassa paranipātavasena ‘‘bhavesu gamanavanto’’ti vattabbepi
anya-e0804n0:1159_6: evamavatvā saddasatthe yebhuyyena guṇasaddānaṁ pubbanipātabhvassa icchitattā saddasatthavidūnaṁ kesañca
anya-e0804n0:1159_7: viññūnaṁ manaṁ tosetuṁ ‘‘bhagavā’’ti pade akkharakkamaṁ anapekkhitvā atthamattanidassanavasena ‘‘āhitaggi,
anya-e0804n0:1159_9: Īdisasmiñhi ṭhāne ‘‘āhitaggī’’ti vā ‘‘aggāhito’’ti vā ‘‘chinnahattho’’ti vā ‘‘hatthacchinno’’ti vā padesu
anya-e0804n0:1159_10: yathā tathā ṭhitesupi atthassa ayutti nāma natthi aññamaññaṁ samānatthattā tesaṁ saddānaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1160_1: Evaṁ visuddhimagge ‘‘bhagavā’’ti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā,
anya-e0804n0:1160_5: bhagasaṅkhātaṁ siriṁ issariyaṁ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṁ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n0:1160_10: Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n0:1163_0: Tathā khandhāyatanadhātādibhede dhammakoṭṭhāse sabbaṁ papañca sabbaṁ yogaṁ sabbaṁ ganthaṁ sabbaṁ saṁyojanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1163_1: samucchinditvā amataṁ dhātuṁ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n0:1163_2: Atha vā sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnappaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena
anya-e0804n0:1163_3: vami uggiri anapekkho pariccaji pajahīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n0:1165_0: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bagavā mato.
anya-e0804n0:1166_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana himavāti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā.
anya-e0804n0:1166_1: Tathā hi sambhavajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘himavāti himapātasamaye himayuttoti himavā.
anya-e0804n0:1166_3: Evaṁ jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘himavā’’ti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā,
anya-e0804n0:1166_8: tasmā ayaṁ nayo sabbatthapi na netabbo.
anya-e0804n0:1166_15: atthayuttiyaṁ sati nipphādetumasakkuṇeyyānipi rūpāni aneneva sijjhanti.
anya-e0804n0:1166_16: Ettha ca yaṁ niruttilakkhaṇaṁ āharitvā dassetabbaṁ siyā,
anya-e0804n0:1166_17: taṁ upari rūpanipphādanādhikāre udāharaṇehi saddhiṁ pakāsessāma.
anya-e0804n0:1171_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññunaṁ
